title: Effect of clinical application based on remote monitoring platform on follow-up compliance of neonatal jaundice and detection rate of hyperbilirubinemia
medical specialty (ICD-11): Factors influencing health status or contact with health services
study purpose: 分析基于远程监测平台的临床应用对新生儿黄疸随访依从性和高胆红素血症检出率的影响
implementation site_1: 中国人民解放军陆军军医大学第一附属医院
randomization_method: None

title: Effects of tele-comprehensive corrective exercise in patients with adolescent idiopathic scoliosis
medical specialty (ICD-11): Diseases of the musculoskeletal system or connective tissue
study purpose: 探究远程综合治疗性运动在青少年特发性脊柱侧凸患者中的治疗效果
randomization_method: Participants who met the inclusion criteria and did not meet the exclusion criteria were selected, and the participants were randomly assigned 1:1 to the test group and the control group based on a random sequence generated by computer software using complete randomization by an independent statistical analyst who was not involved in the intervention process
masking (original): 本研究仅可对结局指标评估者及统计分析者实施盲法

title: The Impact of Internet-Based Remote Rehabilitation Strategies on Hip Function After Total Hip Arthroplasty: A Prospective Randomized Controlled Trial:
medical specialty (ICD-11): Diseases of the musculoskeletal system or connective tissue
study purpose: 主要目的：探究基于互联网的远程康复策略对THA术后疼痛与关节功能的影响，并将其与传统康复策略进行对比。 次要目的：为THA患者术后实施基于互联网的居家康复提供科学依据。
randomization_method: Investigator 1 randomly assigned involved population into two study groups using a computer-based Research Randomizer (www.randomizer.org)
masking (original): 对指导研究参与者术后康复训练的研究者、进行结局指标评估的研究者、进行统计学分析的研究者进行设盲

title: Homogenization of the effectiveness of the "in-person remote" diabetes self-management support model for the comprehensive management of patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus: a national multicenter real-world retrospective study
study purpose: 主要目的：  通过在全国范围内多家三级医疗中心开展“面对面-远程”糖尿病共同照护管理，评价2型糖尿病患者在接受管理1年时的血糖、血压、血脂同时达标率在不同地区间是否存在差异 次要目的：  通过在同一地区的多家医疗中心开展“面对面-远程”糖尿病共同照护管理，评价2型糖尿病患者在接受管理1年时的血糖、血压、血脂同时达标率在同一地区的不同医疗层级间是否存在差异  以在全国范围内多家医疗中心开展的“面对面-远程”糖尿病共同照护管理队列数据，分析2型糖尿病患者并发症及共病现状  以在全国范围内多家医疗中心开展的“面对面-远程”糖尿病共同照护管理队列数据，分析2型糖尿病患者诊疗方案的规范性  通过在全国范围内多家医疗中心开展“面对面-远程”糖尿病共同照护管理，探索影响2型糖尿病患者血糖、血压、血脂达标率的因素  通过在全国范围内多家医疗中心开展“面对面-远程”糖尿病共同照护管理，分析“面对面”规范复诊对2型糖尿病患者代谢控制的作用  通过在全国范围内多家医疗中心开展“面对面-远程”糖尿病共同照护管理，分析远程管理对2型糖尿病患者代谢控制的作用  通过在全国范围内多家医疗中心开展“面对面-远程”糖尿病共同照护管理，探索血糖自我监测行为对2型糖尿病患者血糖控制的作用  以在全国范围内多家医疗中心开展的“面对面-远程”糖尿病共同照护管理队列数据，分析2型糖尿病患者胰岛素治疗方案现状及不同胰岛素方案在血糖控制方面的差异  以在全国范围内多家医疗中心开展的“面对面-远程”糖尿病共同照护管理队列数据，探索2型糖尿病患者自我管理能力、心理及生活质量在疾病控制中的作用  以在全国范围内多家医疗中心开展的“面对面-远程”糖尿病共同照护管理队列数据，探索治疗依从性/治疗惰性对2型糖尿病患者代谢控制的影响
randomization_method: This study was retrospective and did not involve randomized

title: World Health Organization Caregiver Skills Training (WHO-CST) intervention for children aged 2 to 6 years with MEF2C gene deficiency by remote medical mode: a single-arm pilot study
funded (original): 中山大学附属第三医院2023年临床研究专项基金（“启航计划”）资助项目
target Disease / conditions: Neurodevelopmental disorders associated with MEF2C gene defects
study purpose: （1）探讨基于远程医疗模式为MEF2C基因缺陷儿童实施世界卫生组织照顾者培训（WHO-CST）干预的可行性。 （2）通过建立MEF2C基因缺陷相关的神经发育障碍随访队列，对汉族人群MEF2C基因缺陷儿童的临床特征进行调查总结，获取患者干预前的基线数据，加深对该疾病的认识。
implementation site_1: 中山大学附属第三医院（中山大学肝脏病医院）
randomization_method: None

title: Effectiveness of Remote Graded Motor Imagery Therapy for Patients with Central Sensitization Low Back Pain: Study Protocol for a Randomized Controlled Trial
funded (original): 运动健身科技省部共建教育部重点实验室（上海体育大学）
medical specialty (ICD-11): Symptoms, signs or clinical findings, not elsewhere classified
study purpose: 观察远程分级运动想象治疗技术对中枢敏化下腰痛患者的疗效
randomization_method: computer generated random list
masking (original): 由于干预的性质，参与者无法盲性，但评估结果的研究人员将对参与者的分组情况保持盲性，以减少偏倚。

title: Study on the Physical Activity of Post-PCI Patients using Family-Based Phase II Cardiac Telerehabilitation Gamification Program
study purpose: 探讨在团队合作的游戏化中，竞争是促进身体活动更有效的游戏化元素； 探讨亲密的社会关系之间的合作能更好地促进患者身体活动的改善； 探讨基于家庭的II期远程心脏康复游戏化方案与传统的心脏康复相比具有成本效益。
randomization_method: The researchers used Pythoon to generate random sequences for hierarchical randomization
masking (original): 开放标签，对评估者隐藏分组

title: The effect of comprehensive exercise therapy via tele-rehabilitation on motor function in patients with chronic ankle instability
medical specialty (ICD-11): Diseases of the musculoskeletal system or connective tissue
study purpose: 探究远程综合运动治疗对慢性踝关节不稳患者运动功能的影响。
randomization_method: Select participants who meet the inclusion criteria but do not have exclusion criteria, and number them one by one from 1 to 36 in the order of patient inclusion in the trial. Then use a computer to generate a sequence of random numbers, and fill the numbers in the sequence below the numbers in sequence. Sort the numbers in ascending order based on the size of the numbers below them. The first 12 digits are for the remote comprehensive training group, the middle 12 digits are for the outpatient comprehensive training group, and the last 12 digits are for the outpatient lower limb strength training group. Participants will be randomly assigned to the remote comprehensive training group, comprehensive training group, and outpatient lower limb strength training group in a 1:1:1 ratio.
masking (original): 本研究患者和治疗者都无法使用盲法，所以采用对评估者设盲的方式进行研究。所有患者在分组后，第一次运动治疗前都将在门诊由一位不知道他们分组的治疗师进行线下评估。干预结束时以及随访时，所有患者也都由这位治疗师进行评估。

title: Application of telerehabilitation in functional rehabilitation on adolescent idiopathic scoliosis
medical specialty (ICD-11): Diseases of the musculoskeletal system or connective tissue
study purpose: 1.探究远程康复对AIS功能恢复及生活质量的影响； 2.明确康复训练会使AIS患者的哪些生理指标产生变化，探讨患者功能恢复的生理机制。
implementation site_1: 解放军总医院第四医学中心
randomization_method: Remote rehabilitation/telerehablitation and traditional face-to-face rehabilitation training were used as rehabilitation treatment options for the patients. By using a computer-based random number generator, patients were randomly assigned into the remote rehabilitation group and the traditional rehabilitation gro up.
masking (original): 分组方式为随机，不设盲。

title: Implementation of Project ImPACT in autism spectrum disorders: a non-randomized controlled trial
study purpose: 该研究拟通过类实验研究——非随机对照设计，聚焦于6岁以下孤独症谱系障碍这一群体，对孤独症谱系障碍患儿和家长形成的亲子对进行Project ImPACT干预方案的实施，以验证该循证方案在国内实施的有效性和可实施性。
implementation site_1: 佳木斯大学附属第三医院
randomization_method: None

title: influence of family-centered early intervention associated remote feedback from hospital on early development of very preterm infants
funded (original): 中国疾病预防控制中心妇幼保健中心母婴营养与健康研究项目
medical specialty (ICD-11): Factors influencing health status or contact with health services
study purpose: 探究规范、高效的早期干预方法，以减少早期早产儿生后早期运动、认知等发育迟缓、脑瘫等发生率，促进早产儿童健康成长，减轻社会及家庭负担。
implementation site_1: 南方医科大学附属深圳市妇幼保健院
randomization_method: The envelope method was used for grouping randomly, and parents and assessors do not know the classification of infants to avoid subjective assessment bias. Parents draw sealed envelopes for grouping.

title: Application of Remote Cardiac Rehabilitation in Patients with Coronary Heart Disease: A Randomized Controlled Study
funded (original): 中央高水平医院临床科研业务费
study purpose: 本研究旨探索基于远程技术的冠心病居家康复对患者活动能力、心血管病危险因素及生活质量的影响，为冠心病患者远程康复治疗、指南制定提供高级别的循证医学证据。
randomization_method: Randomly divide the enrolled patients into two groups using a random number table method

title: Effectiveness of telerehabilitation for patients with patellofemoral pain
funded (original): 中央高校基本业务金和国家社会基金
medical specialty (ICD-11): Diseases of the musculoskeletal system or connective tissue
study purpose: 评估远程康复对髌股疼痛患者的症状效果
randomization_method: The researcher will use a randomization tool (www.randomizer.org) to generate random sequences.
masking (original): 对参与评估的科研人员实施盲法，并要求不参与干预部分。

title: Effectiveness of telerehabilitation for patients with KOA
funded (original): 中央高校基本业务基金
medical specialty (ICD-11): Diseases of the musculoskeletal system or connective tissue
study purpose: 评估远程康复对膝骨关节炎患者的疗效
randomization_method: Random number table
masking (original): 对参与评估的科研人员实施盲法，并要求不参与干预部分。

title: The Effect of Remote Baduanjin Training on Pain and Function in Patients with Chronic Neck Pain
medical specialty (ICD-11): Symptoms, signs or clinical findings, not elsewhere classified
study purpose: 探究线上八段锦训练对比线上牵伸训练对慢性颈痛患者疼痛以及功能的疗效。
randomization_method: All subjects will be assigned to a random plan in sequence, and a random number table will be created by the experimental researchers using SPSS (25.0) statistical software, except for the experimental intervention. After being pulled into the group, all subjects will be numbered according to the list in the group, and will be divided into the eight section brocade group, the stretching group, and the health education group according to the random number table.
masking (original): 所有的评估都由一位对试验分组和干预过程不知情的评估者完成。

title: A prospective, randomized controlled trial to compare the effects of exercise intervention between telerehabilitation via APP-supervised and routine home-based exercise in patients with pelvic floor dysfunction and related musculoskeletal problems
funded (original): 中央高水平临床专科提升项目
study purpose: 探索远程监督下运动训练对盆底功能障碍症状的改善程度、盆底肌群功能的变化，以及腰痛、骨盆带疼痛、生活质量和运动训练依从性的影响。
implementation site_1: 中国医学科学院北京协和医院
randomization_method: Block randomization was completed by a third party who is not involved in the study through the randomization website (https://www.random.org/), and the envelope method was used to divide the participants into two groups.

title: Study on the effect of Xiangya's self-programmed elastic band exercise rehabilitation programme on physical fitness of elderly patients with sarcopenia based on remote monitoring
medical specialty (ICD-11): Diseases of the musculoskeletal system or connective tissue
study purpose: 主要目的： 探索基于远程监控下湘雅自编弹力带操康复治疗程序对老年肌少症患者握力的改变情况。 次要目的： 1. 探索基于远程监控下湘雅自编弹力带操康复治疗程序对老年肌少症患者心肺适能、步行速度、下肢肌力、柔韧适能、平衡适能的改变情况； 2. 监测试验组和对照组不良事件的发生率，评估基于远程监控下的湘雅自编弹力带操康复程序的安全性。
randomization_method: Using the method of randomised grouping of zones, subjects were randomly assigned to two groups (Group A, the control group, and Group B, the experimental group) in a 1:1 ratio. 1. Depending on the number of subgroups in the study, the size of the zone group is chosen to be 4, which produces 6 permutations: AABB, BBAA, ABAB, BABA, ABBA, BAAB; 2. Obtain random numbers from a table of random numbers; 3. Use the remainder method: take 2 random numbers in sequence, divide by 6, and take the remainder; 4. Grouping: take the remainder of the district group arrangement, random grouping is completed.
masking (original): 被分配到干预组的参与者知道所分配的组别，结果评估员和数据分析员将对分配不知情。

title: Comparison of supervised home-based tele-pulmonary rehabilitation with traditional center-based rehabilitation: a non-inferiority randomized controlled trial
funded (original): 宁夏回族自治区重点研发计划
study purpose: 评估稳定期慢阻肺患者监监督下远程居家肺康复效果是否非劣于传统中心肺康复。
randomization_method: Stratified block randomization will be used, with a computer-generated randomization scheme, to stratify the samples based on lung function (FEV1 < or >= 50% predicted) and recruitment site.

title: Construction and empirical study of the telemedicine-based home care program for palliative care patients
funded (original): 湖南省科技厅重点领域研发计划项目（2020K2121）资助
medical specialty (ICD-11): Factors influencing health status or contact with health services
study purpose: 采用类实验研究对构建的安宁疗护患者远程居家照护方案进行应用效果验证，旨在全面实现对安宁疗护患者的全病程信息化管理，其成果有助于提高患者对远程照护的感知水平，最终形成信息连续、管理连续、关系连续的高品质闭环安宁疗护远程居家照护服务模式。
randomization_method: None

title: Prospective interventional study of home-based cardiac rehabilitation with XINZHILIAO software system on exercise tolerance in patients with coronary heart disease
funded (original): 浙江好络维医疗技术有限公司
study purpose: 评价心知了系统远程心脏康复管理的有效性和安全性，主要干预措施为使用心知了可穿戴设备进行监测下的运动管理和服药提醒，主要评价指标为冠心病患者运动耐量的改善。次要终点包括使用心知了系统指导心脏康复系统的依从性和安全性、心知了指导心脏康复系统治疗3个月后各项指标（复合终点；6分钟步行试验；患者用药依从性、肌力、柔韧性、平衡性、协调性；自我症状量表、体重、腰围、血糖血压血脂达标率）的变化。验证基于心知了系统的心脏康复治疗可改善冠心病运动风险低危患者的运动耐量及临床预后，探索如何使用AI算法对心脏康复远程开展提供支持，具有重要的临床意义。
randomization_method: N/A

title: Clinical application of remote blood pressure management based on "Yijiayi - cloud sharing intelligent cabinet"
funded (original): 医家医云科技(北京)有限公司
study purpose: 1.评价基于“医家医-云享智能柜”的远程血压管理临床效果”； 2.调查透过“医家医-云享智能柜”普及远程血压管理的可行性”。
implementation site_1: 中国医学科学院阜外医院
implementation site_2: 北京市丰台区马家堡社区卫生服务中心
implementation site_3: 北京市丰台区方庄社区卫生服务中心
implementation site_5: 河南省巩义市人民医院
implementation site_9: 青岛大学附属心血管病医院
randomization_method: Hypertension patients who meet the inclusion criteria will be stratified by age and gender, and grouped using a random system.

title: A prospective, randomized controlled trial to compare the therapeutic effects of Scoliosis specific exercise between remote rehabilitation and outpatient rehabilitation in Adolescent Idiopathic Scoliosis
funded (original): 中央高水平医院专科提升项目
study purpose: 探索借助远程技术SSE运动方案对AIS患者Cobb角度、ATR、步态及外观的影响，为AIS患者远程康复治疗、指南制定提供高级别的循证医学证据。
implementation site_1: 中国医学科学院北京协和医院
randomization_method: A randomized grouping method was adopted, and 80 patients were randomly divided into 2 groups with 40 patients in each group. Enrolled patients were numbered according to the order of enrollment. 80 patients were assigned to remote treatment group or outpatient treatment group by randomization website (https://www.random.org/).

title: Effects of remote exercise support based on "online exercise prescription" on exercise behavior of patients with hypertension
funded (original): 广东省佛山市南海区里水镇0-100岁全生命周期健康服务体系项目
study purpose: 探讨基于“线上运动处方”的远程运动支持对高血压患者运动行为的影响。
implementation site_1: 南方医科大学珠江医院
randomization_method: They were divided into the control group and the intervention group by random number table method, with 28 cases in each group.

title: Digital technologies for the post-operative remote care and rehabilitation of thoracic and cardiac surgery patients
funded (original): 中央财政专项资金+单位自筹
medical specialty (ICD-11): Factors influencing health status or contact with health services
target Disease / conditions: Rehabilitation after thoracic and cardiac surgery
study purpose: 建立远程监护和康复的临床量化评价体系，以此全面评估该项目在中国社会及医疗环境下的可行性。
implementation site_2: 复旦大学附属中山医院
randomization_method: Random envelope method. A statistician independent of the clinical trial used Excel to generate a random number table with a 1:1 ratio between the experimental group and the control group. Put strips of paper with grouping information into opaque envelopes in random order. After verifying the inclusion and exclusion criteria, the researchers recorded the basic information of the subjects (initial letter, age, gender, screening number, etc.) and opened the random envelopes in random order to determine whether the patient was assigned to the experimental group or the control group.

title: A randomized controlled study of the efficacy of sequential OPEP combined with inhalation therapy in patients with acute exacerbation of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease
study purpose: 评估序贯OPEP联合吸入治疗远程管理方法对慢性阻塞性肺疾病急性加重期患者运动耐力及的影响。
implementation site_1: 广州医科大学附属第一医院
randomization_method: The randomization plan was generated by the online random permutation generator on the http://www.randomization.com website

title: A randomized controlled study of the efficacy of sequential OPEP combined with inhalation therapy in patients with stable chronic obstructive pulmonary disease
study purpose: 评估序贯OPEP联合吸入治疗远程管理方法对慢性阻塞性肺疾病稳定期患者运动耐力及的影响。
implementation site_1: 广州医科大学附属第一医院
randomization_method: The randomization plan was generated by the online random permutation generator on the http://www.randomization.com website.

title: Clinical outcomes of postoperative application of combination of telerehabilitation with a novel digital biofeedback system after ankle lateral ligament repair / reconstruction
funded (original): 上海复动医疗管理有限公司
medical specialty (ICD-11): Injury, poisoning or certain other consequences of external causes
study purpose: 前瞻性地开展基于远程康复系统的踝关节外侧韧带术后康复治疗的临床研究，比较远程康复系统与传统线下治疗师面对面康复方式的可靠性与有效性，为今后的远程康复治疗以及远程康复服务全面铺开夯实基础。
implementation site_1: 复旦大学附属华山医院
randomization_method: Before the clinical trial, professional biostatisticians use the EXCEL random number table to generate a random allocation sequence, which is realized by the block randomization method with a block length of 2. According to different rehabilitation methods, they are divided into the experimental group and the control group.

title: Pre research on the application of trinity software of family rehabilitation, telemedicine and informatization classroom for aphasia after stroke under the framework of "Internet+"
study purpose: 观察朗读治疗法（ORLA）同步远程言语康复对卒中后失语症（PSA）患者疗效和生活质量的影响。
randomization_method: Computer random number table method

title: Perioperative tele-rehabilitation in elderly patients undergoing pneumonectomy：a randomized controlled trial
funded (original): 中央高水平临床专科提升项目
study purpose: 本研究旨探索远程围术期康复干预对老年肺切除术患者心肺耐力、力量、平衡、日常生活能力、生活质量、情绪，以及术后肺部并发症、术后拔管时间、术后住院时间的影响，为远程康复治疗应用于老年外科手术患者提供高级别的循证医学证据
implementation site_1: 中国医学科学院北京协和医院
randomization_method: Statistical software was SPSS 23.0. The Kolmogorov-Smirnov test or Shapiro-wilk test were used to test the normality of the measurement data. The mean (95% confidence interval of the population mean) was used to represent the approximate normal distribution, and the t test of two independent samples was used

title: Combined exercise and cognitive intervention in Chinese older adults with mild cognitive impairment (COGITO): a home-based and remotely supervised intervention
funded (original): 美国中华医学基金会，项目编号22-477
study purpose: 设计一项满足中国MCI老年患者需求的远程监督居家运动-认知综合干预项目，通过开展随机对照试验以评价干预方案效果并量化其成本效益，分析该干预方案在中国推广的可行性。
implementation site_2: 宁夏回族自治区宁安医院
randomization_method: Researchers in different centers randomly divided 40 subjects into four intervention groups in a ratio of 1:1:1:1 using block randomization.
masking (original): 对评估人员施盲，确保评估人员不知晓患者的分组情况，并嘱咐患者不能告知评估人员自己的分组情况。

title: A study of the efficacy of tele-tai chi versus physical therapy interventions in patients with chronic low back pain: a randomized controlled trial
medical specialty (ICD-11): Symptoms, signs or clinical findings, not elsewhere classified
study purpose: （1）探究远程康复形式治疗慢性腰痛患者的可行性与有效性。 （2）探究远程太极拳与物理治疗对慢性腰痛患者的疼痛程度及功能障碍的改善效果，并明确改善程度是否具有临床意义（最小临床重要差异）。 （3）探究远程太极拳与远程物理治疗对慢性腰痛患者的生活质量、睡眠质量，以及疼痛心理状况的影响，明确心理、社会维度的改善情况。 （4）探究远程太极拳与远程健康宣教对慢性腰痛患者的坐站、平衡能力的影响，明确生理维度的改善情况。
randomization_method: Assignments were made by a researcher who was unaware of the trial using the random number table method to select random numbers as required.
masking (original): 单盲，即结局指标评估者设盲。

title: Effect of the telemedicine-supported multicomponent exercise therapy in patients with knee osteoarthritis: a randomized controlled trial
medical specialty (ICD-11): Diseases of the musculoskeletal system or connective tissue
study purpose: 主要目的 本研究的主要目的是评估远程医疗支持的多成分运动疗法对KOA患者疼痛的影响，并与常规护理治疗进行比较。 次要目的 1.评估远程医疗支持的多成分运动疗法与常规护理治疗相比对KOA患者身体功能和生活质量的影响； 2.评估多成分运动疗法是否改变KOA患者的自我认知，改善心理健康状况，减少疼痛恐惧和疼痛灾难性想象； 3.评估家庭自我管理的KOA患者对多成分运动疗法的依从性是否良好。
randomization_method: A statistician who was blinded to the study's subject matter used a computer program to randomly assign subjects in a 1:1 ratio to the trial group and the control group. Block randomization with a computer-generated random sequence will be used to perform randomization when participants are recruited. A senior statistician from the West China Hospital, Sichuan University's Centre for Biostatistics, Design, Measurement, and Evaluation will create the randomization sequence. To guarantee equitable distribution to each group, permuted blocks of sizes 4 or 6 will be utilized at random.
masking (original): 受试者和医生无法施盲。评估者也无法实施盲法，因为受试者不是盲法，结果是自我报告的。虽然参与者、医生和评估人员没有采用盲法，但该研究使用了其他方法来减少偏倚。为了避免影响治疗预期或结局指标的测量，参与者和评估者都没有被告知研究假设。分析数据的统计学家也将不知道分组分配。

title: Effectiveness of telerehabilitation-based unsupervised structured exercise therapy and education for patients with chronic non-specific neck pain: a randomized controlled trial
medical specialty (ICD-11): Symptoms, signs or clinical findings, not elsewhere classified
study purpose: 探讨基于远程康复的无监督结构化运动疗法和教育对慢性非特异性颈痛患者的疗效，并将其与传统治疗作疗效对比。
randomization_method: Tables of random numbers are generated by statisticians using Excel.
masking (original): 本研究仅可对结局指标评估员及统计分析者实施盲法结局评估员将接受数据收集程序方面的标准化培训。将邀请不参加本研究的数据录入人员进行数据录入，这样就保证了统计学家在实施数据分析时不知道参与者的分组。由于干预的性质，无法对物理治疗师和参与者实施盲法。

title: Telemedicine-Assisted Structured Self-Monitoring of Blood Glucose in Management of T2DM Results of a randomized clinical trial
funded (original): 上海市卫生和计划生育委员会（201540140）
study purpose: 评估远程医疗系统支持下的自我血糖监测与单纯的自我血糖监测对2型糖尿病患者院外血糖的影响
implementation site_1: 复旦大学附属中山医院青浦分院
randomization_method: Zhang Min used the random number table method for randomization.

title: The effectiveness of application-based acceptance and commitment therapy on patients with lung cancer and their family caregivers: a randomized controlled trial
study purpose: 1. 主要目的：探讨基于微信小程序的接纳承诺疗法对肺癌患者及肺癌照顾者心理灵活性、焦虑、抑郁、生活质量和照顾者负担的有效性； 2. 次要目的：为临床护理人员改善肺癌患者及其家庭照顾者心理健康提供证据和方案。
randomization_method: An independent researcher uses the IBM SPSS26.0 software random number generation module to generate random number sequences.
masking (original): 结果统计人员对患者分配结果及患者接受干预的类型不知情

title: Effect of telemedicine-supported structured exercise program in patients with chronic low back pain: a randomized controlled trial
medical specialty (ICD-11): Symptoms, signs or clinical findings, not elsewhere classified
study purpose: 主要目标 本研究的主要目的是评估远程医疗支持的结构化运动项目对CLBP患者疼痛的影响，并与传统模式(纸质版运动疗法)进行比较。 次要目标 i)评估远程医疗支持的结构化运动项目与传统模式(纸质版运动疗法)相比对CLBP患者的身体功能、生活质量和精神病理症状的影响。 ii)评估有监督的运动疗法与健康指导相结合是否比传统模式(纸质版运动疗法)具有更好的运动依从性和更少的疼痛恐惧或疼痛灾难性想象。
randomization_method: Subjects were randomly assigned to the trial group and the control group at a 1:1 ratio according to a computer software-generated random sequence by a statistician who is blinded to the study content. Randomization will be performed as participants are recruited using block randomization with a computer-generated random sequence. The randomization sequence will be prepared by a senior statistician at the Centre for Biostatistics, Design, Measurement, and Evaluation of West China Hospital, Sichuan University. Random permuted blocks of sizes 4 or 6 will be used to ensure equal allocation to each group.
masking (original): 本研究仅可对结局指标评估者及统计分析者实施盲法。

title: Application of telemedicine technology in home cardiac rehabilitation of patients after heart valve surgery in county medical institutions
study purpose: 拟通过对远程医疗技术在粤西县域医疗机构心脏瓣膜术后患者居家心脏康复中的应用进行研究，探索适合远程医疗技术在粤西县域地区心脏瓣膜术后患者居家心脏康复的实施模式。
randomization_method: This study was double-blind, and the personnel responsible for randomization and the statisticians were blinded. Write the serial number of the random control in advance and put it in the envelope box, the singular number is the observation group, and the even number is the experimental group. Envelope samp
masking (original): 双盲，负责分配入组的人员，不知晓具体工作内容；收集整理、统计数据的人员不知晓该统计的项目内容。

title: the effect of remote and traditional balance training in people with chronic ankle instability: a randomized controlled trial

medical specialty (ICD-11): Diseases of the musculoskeletal system or connective tissue

randomization_method: randomization

title: Effectiveness of artificial intelligence visual simulation and augmented reality technology in assisting remote rehabilitation after isolated meniscus injury: a prospective randomized controlled trial

randomization_method: Combine simple random and concealed grouping, use SPSS 23.0 (IBM, NewYork, NY, USA) to generate random numbers, stipulate that the research subjects with odd random numbers are assigned to the experimental group, and the even numbers are assigned to the control group; the envelope method is used for concealed grouping , performed by third-party personnel, in a light-tight envelope to keep the randomization plan.
masking (original): 评估人员不知道患者身份及分组信息

title: Clinical study on the effect of remote management based on wechat technology on the treatment of patients with premature ejaculation
study purpose: 早泄一般多以门诊和居家相结合的治疗模式为主，居家期间高度依赖患者的自我管理，因缺乏适宜的手段，治疗效果往往与预期微有偏差。本研究拟借助互联网，通过微信App对已接受院内对症治疗的早泄患者进行为期8周的科学、有效的居家远程管理(提供早泄的疾病患教、行为指导等课程），观察患者的临床变化，包括PEDT、IELT等临床评价。研究一方面探讨数字技术对患者的价值，另一方面提高患者治疗的隐私性，期望实现“以患者为中心”的疾病治疗与管理。
implementation site_1: 中山大学附属第一医院
randomization_method: Random table

title: A Remote Chronic Disease Management Platform Based on Patient Portal System: a Construction and Empirical Study

study purpose: 1.通过病人门户系统构建患者连续个人电子健康记录和慢病管理平台，实时上传和下载个人的病史和医疗信息，提供居家慢病管理服务、完成门诊-住院-随访的整体医疗程序的促进。 2.通过随机对照试验，评价该慢病管理平台对高血压的管理效果，了解平台对高血压慢病患者的自我管理能力、服药依从性、生活质量的影响。
implementation site_1: 四川省医学科学院.四川省人民医院
randomization_method: A nurse who was not involved in this study used the SAS system PROCPLAN procedure statement to give the number of seeds and list the serial numbers as 001-320. Using the method of randomly assigning numbers from 001 to 320 to generate matching random numbers, it is specified that those with even numbers are assigned to group A and odd numbers are assigned to group B.
masking (original): 由于干预组和对照组的区别是是否使用可穿戴设备和进入远程管理平台，所以很难对受试者和观察者设盲，只能对结局评估者和数据分析人员设盲。

study purpose: 1. 主要目的：探索帕金森病互联网远程康复管理app对帕金森病患者运动症状和非运动症状的疗效影响。 2. 次要目的：研究互联网远程康复管理app在帕金森病患者中应用的可行性、安全性；调查患者的依从性。

randomization_method: According to the preliminary calculation of 126 sample observation cases, A random number table containing 1-126 (including shedding cases) was given. Each main researcher of the project team assigned case numbers in order, and each case number was randomly assigned to group A or Group B, group A was th

title: Application research on individualized precise injury prevention and treatment of knee based on research and development of smart wearable devices and construction of remote 5G technology sports and rehabilitation
medical specialty (ICD-11): Diseases of the musculoskeletal system or connective tissue
study purpose: 研发可穿戴便携式智能运动、康复设备，并与整套科学的膝关节运动、康复知识库融合，通过 5G 运动康复云平台，将运动和康复训练指导员、医生、人群、设备、 互联网平台和运动康复知识库结合起来，实现健康人群、膝关节功能不足者和术后 患者膝关节运动功能的个体化远程精准评估与康复训练指导。

study purpose: 以常用社交软件微信APP为介质，利用丰富的音、画、视等传播途径，开展健康普及、康复指导、随访提醒、视频指导居家便携睡眠监测等远程管理模式，与常规的电话随访相比较，探究远程管理模式联合便携式睡眠监测仪对OSA患者术后随访的影响，以期为OSA术后患者的随访管理带来帮助。

implementation site_3: 北京大学第三医院海淀院区

title: Effects of community-based telecare intervention in increasing compliance and maintaining disease control among adults with hypertension and diabetes in primary care: A randomised controlled trial
study purpose: 1.主要目标：与常规护理相比，通过社区远程医疗干预实现非劣质疾病控制。 2.次要目标是: (1) 与常规护理对比，探究基于社区的远程医疗干预对医疗保健可及性(减少错过的医疗预约数量)的影响； (2) 与常规护理相较，探究基于社区的远程医疗干预对健康行为和药物依从性的影响； (3) 探究相较于常规护理中接受的医疗保健，患者对干预的满意度； (4) 探究干预措施的成本效益。
randomization_method: The randomisation sequence will be generated by an experienced independent statistician using computer-generated random results. masking (original): The research staff member who conducts the statistical analysis will be blind to the group assignment.

title: Research on the effectiveness of telerehabilitation in patients undergoing artificial hip arthroplasty
funded (original): 上海复动医疗管理有限公司
medical specialty (ICD-11): Factors influencing health status or contact with health services
study purpose: 1.本研究的目的是评估移动应用程序联合智能可穿戴设备的远程康复系统在人工髋关节置换术后应用的可行性，并将其临床结果与常规康复进行比较。 2.为髋关节置换术患者开展远程康复护理提供实践参考。

study purpose: 本次研究提供的新颖、简易的、有监督功能的可穿戴设备，可以提升患者的参与感和对病情的及时反馈能力。这种设备可以解决就医的地理问题和交通问题，如在较远的农村和城市。如果我们的这项研究认为可以帮助患者节省花费，对于人口众多并且日益老年化加重的中国和医疗服务的提升都是有帮助的，应该值得推广。

randomization_method: Use of random number table method

title: Clinical value of tele-pulmonary rehabilitation in COPD patients

study purpose: 探讨慢阻肺患者的远程肺康复治疗后6分钟步行距离以及呼吸症状、生活质量、体力活动和下肢肌肉功能方面改善情况，比较远程肺康复是否优于传统的肺康复。
implementation site_1: 内蒙古医科大学附属医院
randomization_method: Computerized Random Number Method

title: Effects of smartphone application based music intervention on improving the emotional and psychosomatic symptoms of patients with hematological malignancy

study purpose: 探讨音乐干预对血液恶性肿瘤患者情绪及身心症状的疗效。
randomization_method: Numbered according to the order of enrollment, to take the odd numbers as the experimental group, and take the even numbers as the control group.

title: Study on the application of remote attention bias correction in the intervention of anxiety disorders
study purpose: 本研究将针对高焦虑症状和焦虑障碍个体的负性注意偏向，开发出意识下注意偏向矫正的远程干预系统，在部分个体中利用治疗前环路特征作为生物学标记，对高焦虑个体和焦虑障碍患者进行治疗前筛选,结合目前的脑环路研究成果和认知科学研究成果。将 ABMT 治疗转化到临床实践并进行临床评价,为焦虑障碍的早期干预提供更有效的安全 策略。该研究的实施将有助于脑影像研究和认知科学研究成果向临床转化，基于意识下注意偏向矫正的远程干预系统将极大地提升高焦虑障碍个体的早期干预机会，从而从整 体上降低焦虑障碍对个体和社会带来的负担
randomization_method: Researchers generate the random number sequence by computer based on simple randomization

title: Application of remote rehabilitation training and evaluation system in chronic obstructive pulmonary disease
funded (original): 国家重点研发计划或省市研究项目或产学研合作
study purpose: 通过远程康复训练与评估系统在慢阻肺患者家庭中的应用，观察其对慢阻肺患者肺功能、运动功能、呼吸心率功能、生活质量、心理健康、氧化应激损伤、脂质代谢组学变化、环境影响机制、睡眠质量分析、社交活动影响及患者依从性的影响，评估其在远程康复中的效果，以期改善慢阻肺患者的肺功能及生活质量，提高家庭肺康复效率。
randomization_method: The third-party statisticians use SPSS statistical software to generate random schemes by random number table method.

title: Application research of regional remote dynamic blood glucose management cloud technology in improving adverse pregnancy outcomes in patients with gestational diabetes
study purpose: 利用互联网技术组建一级、二级医疗体系，对妊娠期的血糖控制实现区域内多医疗机构的统一服务平台，做到临床诊断标准统一，血糖监测和治疗方案统一，血糖数据管理统一；建立远程管理中心，将移动医疗技术设备、远程数据诊疗云平台、大数据分析等新的临床管理技术与临床结合，探索新型的妊娠期糖尿病临床管理模式，实现对分中心的远程指导和培训。为政府而言提供新型的临床管理模式示范项目，为提高健康管理水平，节约医疗开支，充分利用高端医疗资源和专家资源提供解决方案。
randomization_method: Computer software Excel

randomization_method: The random assignment sequence will be entrusted to specialized statistical analysts to apply the PROC PLAN process of the statistical software SAS 9.1 program to generate random numbers that will randomly assign eligible subjects into the groups in a 1:1:1:1 ratio according to the included sequential number.

title: Feasibility analysis and evaluation of remote monitoring of family rehabilitation of patients with back pain based on digital medical platform
medical specialty (ICD-11): Symptoms, signs or clinical findings, not elsewhere classified
study purpose: 采用包含数字疗法的系统平台对腰背痛患者的随访和康复过程进行跟踪管理，利用机器学习算法训练动作捕捉模型，通过手机端应用程序对患者康复相关的家庭训练进行实时运动匹配，多维度监控康复质量，提升患者康复方案执行的依从度和完成效率，改善患者的康复体验和生活质量；同时也提高医护人员（医生、康复师等）的工作效率；另外对随访计划与康复方案的个体化配置，同时根据患者个体康复的实际进展，由康复师动态调整其随访和康复训练计划，增益康复的效果。
randomization_method: The random sequence was generated by the statistician using computer.

title: The construction and empirical analysis of E-Health education model for the elderly with T2DM in the rural areas of Guangdong
study purpose: 主要目的：构建农村老年夫妻糖尿病协同远程管理模式，并验证该模式在我国农村老年糖尿病管理中应用的有效性。
randomization_method: Participants of each community health center will be randomized 1:1 within center into a couple-based arm and an individual-based arm. Stratified randomization by patients’gender and age group will be performed alongside randomization of the class sequence,by a statistician otherwise not involved
masking (original): 该行为干预研究为开放性试验，但结果测量人员及统计分析人员都将不知晓分组情况。

title: Design, development and demonstration of remote cardiac rehabilitation platform for children with congenital heart disease: from evidence-based design to feasibility test
funded (original): 四川大学华西第二医院临床科研基金
study purpose: 本研究致力于构建专业规范的先心患儿心脏康复移动健康服务平台，以此为媒介实施儿童居家心脏康复，为儿童心脏康复的数字化干预提供初期范本。具体目标如下： 1.基于以用户为中心的系统设计理念，设计开发适于先心患儿群体及其监护人使用的移动健康平台HeartFIT； 2.通过可用性测试，对HeartFIT初始版本进行迭代升级，保证系统的有效性、高效性和用户满意度； 3.以移动健康平台为干预实施载体，进行前期预试验和可行性测试，验证干预方案的可行性、可接受性和初步效果，为下一步扩大试验规模和应用推广奠定实证基础。
implementation site_1: 四川大学华西第二医院
randomization_method: Stratified randomly, stratified according to the patient's surgical approach (interventional versus surgical thoracotomy); Random assignment sequences will be generated by third-party statisticians using SAS software Version 9.4 (SAS Institute, Cary, NC).
masking (original): 所有参与的参与者和研究人员都将了解小组的隶属关系，但终点评估将由带口罩的医务人员进行。

title: Development of 5G MR remote diagnosis and treatment system and its preliminary application in neurosurgery
medical specialty (ICD-11): Factors influencing health status or contact with health services
study purpose: 1.主要目的：5G混合现实远程诊疗系统开发； 2.次要目的：在神经外科初步应用。
implementation site_1: 中国科学院大学宁波华美医院
randomization_method: Randomization according to a random number list generated by a computer

title: The effect of a telemedicine-based parent-mediated intervention program on children with autism spectrum disorder and their parents: a randomized controlled trial
study purpose: 主要目的：采用随机对照试验研究方法，探索基于远程医疗模式下父母参与干预对孤独症谱系障碍患儿的影响，为建立规范的综合干预模式和家长心理教育干预模式提供参考依据。
implementation site_1: 福建省妇幼妇幼保健院
randomization_method: The researcher used the block random grouping method by SAS 9.3 software to generate random number tables for numbering grouping.

title: Effectiveness of telerehabilitation on short-term quality of life of patients after esophageal cancer surgery during COVID-19
funded (original): 福建省财政专项(批准号:2020CZ011）
study purpose: 在本研究中，旨在调查远程康复干预对食管癌术后的生活质量提高的有效性。
implementation site_1: 福建医科大学附属协和医院
randomization_method: A series of random numbers were generated using the SPSS Software and assigned into two groups in a 1:1 ratio ahead of the first patient’s admission in the study.

title: Social participation of patients with spinal cord injury: construction of peer-led remote facilitation model and intervention mechanism study
funded (original): 广东省基础与应用基础研究基金自然科学基金
medical specialty (ICD-11): Injury, poisoning or certain other consequences of external causes
study purpose: 本研究的目的是探索我国脊髓损伤患者的社会参与现状和重建过程，了解其促进与阻碍因素，构建我国脊髓损伤患者社会参与重建的理论模型；在理论指导下，构建并实施同伴导师主导的社会参与远程促进模式；并探索该模式的核心中介因素，为阐明该模式的作用机制及进一步推进该模式提供理论依据。本研究有助于解决我国脊髓损伤患者的社会隔离难题，为促进该群体的社会参与开辟新路径。
randomization_method: The researchers will use the computer software Research Randomizer to generate a table of random numbers for each research center, in which 1 was the experimental group and 2 was the control group. Patients were randomly divided into two groups according to the order of admission.

title: The effects of individualized exercise prescription combined with remote exercise management on cardiovascular risk factors in overweight and obese patients
funded (original): 北京康复医院科研基金（2019-007）
study purpose: 探讨个体化运动处方结合远程运动管理对超重及肥胖人群心血管疾病危险因素的干预效果。
implementation site_1: 首都医科大学附属北京康复医院
randomization_method: No

title: Analysis of the Effect of Internet Remote Management on Patients with hypertension in Inner Mongolia through telemanagement
study purpose: 1、在内蒙古地区建立高血压信息化管理平台； 2、探讨高血压远程管理是否可以提高内蒙古地区高血压患者的治疗达标率； 3、远程管理对提高患者用药依从性有无作用； 4、远程管理是否在改善生活方式及控制可控的心血管危险因素方面更具优势。
implementation site_1: 包头医学院第二附属医院
implementation site_2: 内蒙古乌兰察布市中心医院
implementation site_4: 锡林郭勒盟东乌珠穆沁旗旗医院
randomization_method: Non-randomization.

title: The validation and usability of remote health home-based fitness assessment test mobile application in adults
funded (original): 成都尚醫信息科技有限公司
medical specialty (ICD-11): Factors influencing health status or contact with health services
study purpose: 探讨远程居家健康软件(R plus health APP)在 APP 自我居家测试、APP 标准测试、 临床标准测试 3 种不同环境中测试结果的相关性，及 APP 在使用过程中的易用性。
randomization_method: Simple and convenient sampling and drawing lots were adopted to randomly assign test sequence.

title: Effects of online significant others participatory dignity therapy on the psychological well-being of patients with hematologic malignancies and their significant others: A randomised controlled trial.
funded (original): 省级科技创新联合资金项目
study purpose: 在前期研究的基础上，构建出了重要他人参与式尊严疗法远程干预方案；通过临床应用，评价其对恶性血液肿瘤患者尊严水平、希望水平及生命意义的干预效果，同时评价该方案对患者重要他人焦虑、抑郁的干预效果及对双方之间亲密关系的影响。
implementation site_1: 福建医科大学附属协和医院
randomization_method: A random number sequence within the range 1-70 was generated by a non-member of the group using the Research Randomizer website (https://www.randomizer.org/), and these random numbers were then placed in separate sequentially coded, sealed and opaque envelopes and stored properly.
masking (original): 本研究无法对研究对象及干预者（研究者本人）采用盲法，故在效果评价时采用盲法评价，即资料收集者不参加研究对象的干预过程，也不了解研究对象的具体分组。

title: A Multi-Center Clinical Study of Long-Range Home Cardiac Rehabilitation
funded (original): 江苏创越医疗科技有限公司
study purpose: 通过多中心研究，探讨远程家庭心脏康复的安全、有效、及康复价值，建立科学的家庭心脏康复的规范流程和管理模式。

implementation site_7: 安徽中医药大学第二附属医院
implementation site_9: 新疆阿克苏地区第一人民医院
implementation site_10: 宁夏回族自治区第五人民医院
randomization_method: Ma Jing, a researcher of Zhejiang hospital, generated the random sequence through the cardiopulmonary rehabilitation management system, and the system generated the random number sequence according to the random number table method of medical statistics; the subjects corresponding to the random even number were&#
masking (original): 单盲，即受试者对入组组别、实施的措施均不知情。

funded (original): 国家重点研发计划重大慢性非传染性疾病防控研究子课题（课题编号2018YFC1315602）
study purpose: 本研究旨在比较线下社区医院干预与三级甲等医院微信干预对稳定冠心病患者药物依从性和危险因素控制的影响。
implementation site_1: 中国医学科学院阜外医院
randomization_method: Non randomized controlled trial

title: Remote CBT after deep brain stimulation for Parkinson's comorbidities depression

implementation site_1: 上海交通大学附属瑞金医院

randomization_method: The random number table is generated by the computer and the subjects are randomly arranged.

title: Efficacy and mechanism of online Qigong intervention in type 2 diabetic peripheral neuropathy
funded (original): 北京市双一流科研经费
study purpose: 1.探讨线上气功辅助干预糖尿病周围神经病变的临床疗效。 2.探讨线上气功辅助干预糖尿病周围神经病变的可行性、安全性和可接受性。 3.探讨线上气功锻炼对糖尿病周围神经病变炎症因子、神经生长因子及血清皮质醇的分子机制。
implementation site_1: 北京中医药大学东方医院
implementation site_2: 北京中医药大学东直门医院
implementation site_3: 北京中医药大学第三附属医院
randomization_method: After baseline assessment, participants satisfying the inclusion criteria will be randomly allocated to either a Qigong intervention group or a wait-list usual medical care control group using a computer-generated randomization schedule by a researcher who is independent of recruitment and assessments.

title: Remotely monitored Baduanjin exercise in moderate-to-severe chronic obstructive pulmonary disease patients (BROCADE)
funded (original): 国家重点研发计划（2018YFC1313600）；国家自然科学基金重点国际（地区）合作研究项目（81820108001）；国家自然科学基金项目（81670029）；江苏省医学重点人才项目（ZDRCA2016018）；江苏省333高层次人才工程第二层次培养对象（中青年领军人才）（BRA2019078）
study purpose: 通过远程监控下八段锦运动对稳定期中重度慢性阻塞性肺疾病（COPD）患者的临床症状、生活质量、活动能力及耐力、肺功能、呼吸肌功能的影响。
implementation site_1: 南京医科大学第一附属医院
implementation site_2: 南京医科大学附属老年医院
randomization_method: A data statistician used the software to prepare a random number table, which was used to divide subjects into control group, conventional pulmonary rehabilitation group, and Baduanjin group by the way of drawing random envelopes.

title: Study on the effect of exercise bracelet and remote exercise guidance on BMI, physical fitness and physical activity level of obese adolescents
funded (original): 山东大学专题数据库建设
study purpose: 1.1 评价应用运动手环及相关APP是否能提高肥胖青少年的日常体力活动水平 1.2 将远程运动指导和常规有监督的运动干预进行比较，评价远程运动指导是否可以改善肥胖青少年的BMI、体适能及心血管疾病风险因素。 1.3 比较远程运动指导中不同运动方式对肥胖青少年作用的差异，主要是比较高强度间歇性运动和中等强度持续有氧运动。 1.4 应用定性方法结合运动参与程度比较不同干预方案在受试者中的接受程度，可推广性。
randomization_method: Study leader generates the random number sequence by using a random digits table

title: Evaluation of the impact of telemedicine supervise intervention programs on swallowing function and swallowing-related quality of life in patients with oral cancer postoperative: a prospective controlled trial
funded (original): 宁省高校基础科研项目（ LQNK201725）
study purpose: 进行一项前瞻性随机对照试验研究基于微信平台的远程医疗监督干预方案对东北地区口腔癌患者吞咽功能和吞咽相关生活质量的可行性和影响。

title: Effect of remote management on comprehensive management of diabetes mellitus during the COVID-19 epidemic

randomization_method: The patients were numbered and randomly assigned in a 1:1 ratio to the intervention group or the control group by computer.

title: Remote blood pressure management clinical application research
funded (original): 青岛市科技局专项资金
study purpose: 大范围普及基于“ 云享智能柜” 的远程血压管理模式。为基层医院提供一个智能、 简单、 高效的管理居民慢性病的创新工具，促进我国慢性病管理水平的提升； 采用智能终端设备， 实现数据自动采集、 传输， 确保患者血压数据真实、 及时、 连续， 为学术研究和慢性病的防治提供数据参考和依据， 促进我国慢病防治科研成果转化。
implementation site_1: 青岛大学附属心血管病医院

implementation site_2: 上海市宝山区吴淞中心医院
randomization_method: Random numbers were generated by random number table, and then they were sorted to generate random numbers.

medical specialty (ICD-11): Diseases of the musculoskeletal system or connective tissue
study purpose: 探讨远程康复对腰椎间盘突出患者疼痛、功能、心理的改善效果，为临床干预提供更多可选择的方案。
implementation site_1: 四川省八一康复中心（四川省康复医院）

title: Study on comprehensive rehabilitation System of common bone and joint Diseases in the elderly: Evaluation of curative effect of remote rehabilitation on cervical spondylosis

study purpose: 探讨远程康复对颈椎病的疗效。

randomization_method: Random table produced by computer

medical specialty (ICD-11): Diseases of the musculoskeletal system or connective tissue

implementation site_10: 首都医科大学附属朝阳医院

title: Hand tele-rehabilitation sysytem based on data-driven
funded (original): 上海申康医院发展中心
target Disease / conditions: Scar Contracture Malformation after Hand Burns
study purpose: 本研究创新性地将康复机器人与远程康复结合并应用于手部烧伤瘢痕挛缩畸形患者，通过临床研究初步验证其安全性和有效性，从而为其应用于临床提供理论依。
implementation site_1: 上海交通大学医学院附属第九人民医院
randomization_method: This study is a prospective, randomized, controlled trial，with test group and control group ；a block randomization method is proposed

title: A study of next-generation CBT remote therapy for obsessive-compulsive disorder based on individualized assessment
funded (original): 拟申请促进市级医院临床技能与临床创新三年行动计划（2020-2022年）重大临床研究项目
study purpose: （1）基于暴露反应预防（ERP）和正念等心理治疗技术，针对强迫症患者开发基于个体化评估的新一代认知行为技术的远程治疗。 （2）明确基于个体化评估的新一代认知行为（CBT）技术远程治疗强迫症是否有效、可行、安全和具有较好的成本效果和治疗效用。

title: Clinical application of systematic management based on remote patient monitoring in home automated peritoneal dialysis therapy

implementation site_1: 复旦大学附属华山医院北院

title: Establishment of spinal cord injury rehabilitation platform and remote rehabilitation guidance system
funded (original): 北京市卫生和健康委员会
medical specialty (ICD-11): Injury, poisoning or certain other consequences of external causes
study purpose: 1）构建康复协同服务平台，发展“互联网 +”模式下的新型康复； 2）结合 VR 技术，建立康复 APP 平台及新型康复器械； 3）探讨远程家庭康复指导在脊髓损伤康复训练的应用。
randomization_method: SCI patients who underwent spinal nerve decompression with internal fixation at Beijing Bo’ai Hospital from January 2018 to October 2018, after signing the informed consent form with the patient’s informed consent, Liu Jun applied random sampling method to randomize the control group.

title: The influence of remote management based on CAPD+ on controlling fluid overload in CAPD patients
medical specialty (ICD-11): Factors influencing health status or contact with health services
study purpose: 探索利用CAPD+远程管理方式，是否更有利于容量负荷的管理，改善生活质量，减少入院率及心血管事件。
randomization_method: non-random

title: Development and evaluation of a remote creative expressive program for patient with mild cognitive impairment
study purpose: 构建轻度认知障碍患者远程创新表达认知干预方案；评价远程创新表达认知干预方案对轻度认知障碍患者认知功能、情绪状态的干预效果；探索远程创新表达认知干预的中枢作用机制。
randomization_method: Before randomisation, a researcher not involved in subject recruitment and data collection will prepare a randomisation list with 37 sets of numbers, where 1, 2, and 3 represent the CrEAS, active control, and waitlist control groups, respectively, using Research Randomizer software (http://www.randomizer.org/).
masking (original): 本研究属于非药物干预试验，无法对干预者和参与者设盲，因此本研究仅对数据收集者和统计人员设盲。

title: The study on telemedicine management model for elderly patients with chronic diseases at home in Beijing
funded (original): 北京市科学技术委员会-老龄科技服务创新能力提升项目
study purpose: 1.1 构建以药师为主导的居家老年慢病患者远程药物治疗管理模式； 1.2 构建与医疗级可穿戴设备对接的居家老年慢病患者药物治疗管理平台； 1.3 制定居家老年慢病患者药物治疗管理服务团体标准，在区域内进行推广； 1.4 提高基层医疗机构药学服务能力，促进互联网技术在医疗行业的应用。
implementation site_2: 北京市昌平区回龙观社区卫生服务中心
implementation site_3: 北京市延庆区永宁镇社区卫生服务中心
implementation site_4: 北京泰康之家·燕园养老社区
randomization_method: The study is a non-randomized controlled study, using a self-controlled study method

title: A clinical study for the effect of remote monitoring exercise rehabilitation on the discharged patients with novel coronavirus pneumonia (COVID-19)
funded (original): 江苏长风药业有限公司
study purpose: 观察远程监控下运动康复对新型冠状病毒肺炎出院患者呼吸困难程度、心肺耐力、体能水平、生活质量等各方面的影响。
implementation site_2: 湖北省中西医结合医院
randomization_method: Meng hongdao, a data statistician, used the software to prepare a random number table, which was used to divide subjects into trial group or control group by the way of drawing random envelopes.

title: The Efficacy and Safety of Utilizing Mobile Phone and Motion Detector For Telerehabilitation After Arthroscopic Surgery of Rotator Cuff Tear: Single-center, Prospective Randomized Controlled Trial
funded (original): 中山大学孙逸仙纪念医院
medical specialty (ICD-11): Injury, poisoning or certain other consequences of external causes
study purpose: (1) 本实验拟开发针对肩袖损伤患者的智能手机远程康复锻炼系统，以实现医生对患者康复锻炼的远程指导，摆脱传统门诊康复锻炼的地理和交通限制； (2) 通过严密设计的随机对照研究，验证智能手机在肩袖损伤患者术后康复锻炼中的有效性，以期为远程医疗的推广和智能手机在医疗中的应用提供基础。
implementation site_1: 中山大学孙逸仙纪念医院
randomization_method: computer generated

title: A practical study for the effect of exercise qigong on postoperative rehabilitation of breast cancer patients
study purpose: 探究健身气功远程干预对乳腺癌术者术后康复的影响
randomization_method: After the informed consent, the subjects were assigned to the qigong group or the regular exercise rehabilitation group using a random number table.

title: Frequent patient retraining by telemedicine reduces peritonitis in peritoneal dialysis: a randomised controlled trial
medical specialty (ICD-11): Factors influencing health status or contact with health services
study purpose: 本研究的目的包括 1.降低本中心患者腹膜炎的发生率。 2.探索患者再培训的方法和培训频率。 3.探索通过远程医疗进行培训和家访的模式。
implementation site_1: 四川省医学科学院 四川省人民医院
randomization_method: Central randomization and the computer generates a random code.

title: Effect of distance training on cognitive function and resting state brain magnetic resonance in cerebral small vessel disease
study purpose: 本研究从轻度认知障碍治疗的角度出发，探讨BrainHQ和/或Fit Brains Trainer训练对海马、内嗅皮层体积、海马、内嗅皮层功能连接、临床疗效各指标的相关性，进一步评价BrainHQ 和/或Fit Brains Trainer训练对轻度认知障碍的治疗作用和脑功能可塑性的影响。
randomization_method: N/A

title: Effect of remote cognitive training on cognitive function and resting state brain magnetic resonance in mild cognitive impairment
study purpose: 研究目的：本研究从轻度认知障碍治疗的角度出发，探讨BrainHQ和/或Fit Brains Trainer训练对海马、内嗅皮层体积、海马、内嗅皮层功能连接、临床疗效各指标的相关性，进一步评价BrainHQ 和/或Fit Brains Trainer训练对轻度认知障碍的治疗作用和脑功能可塑性的影响。
randomization_method: Through the SPSS statistical software programming to generate random numbers, the software is now numbered 1 to 100, and then set the fixed value in the random data generator, and then calculate the variables, the use of functions to generate random numbers, ranking the case and re-encoded as different

title: Research for Clinical Application of Remote Rehabilitation Training and Evaluation System
funded (original): 苏州市科学技术局拨款 20.00 万元
study purpose: 1.验证远程康复训练与评估系统对脑卒中引起的肢体运动功能障碍康复评估的有效性及安全性。 2.验证远程康复训练与评估系统评估与人工Fugl-meyer量表、Brunnstrom量表评估的一致性。 3.验证远程康复训练与评估系统在“社区－家庭”康复中的有效性。
implementation site_1: 黄桥社区卫生服务中心
implementation site_2: 元和社区卫生服务中心
randomization_method: The third-party statisticians use SPSS statistical software to generate random schemes by random number table method.

title: Clinical and economic evaluation of remote patient monitoring combining with internet-based outpatient telerehabilitation for patients following total knee arthroplasty
medical specialty (ICD-11): Factors influencing health status or contact with health services
study purpose: 1.探讨智能可穿戴系统与传统术后康复的临床效果的比较 2.探讨智能可穿戴系统与传统术后康复的经济学性价比分析
implementation site_1: 中国人民解放军总医院
randomization_method: Eligible patients were randomly assigned into one of two groups through computer-generated randomization codes with a 1:1 allocation ratio

title: Application and early warning index distinguish of acute aggravation of remote management based on 'internet plus' for the chronic obstructive pulmonary disease
funded (original): 湖南省卫生健康委员会科技计划重点项目
study purpose: 利用互联网技术及物联网便携式设备实现人群慢阻肺早期筛查，评价其在慢阻肺早期诊断中的价值；通过互联网远程管理系统及便携式设备对患者进行个体化远程监测，开展远程综合防治，评估远程管理对于慢阻肺急性加重识别及自我管理水平的影响；获得稳定期及急性加重期患者肺功能、气道微生物组成、痰液细胞学组成、生物标记物等信息，阐明各指标对将来发生AECOPD的影响，建立慢阻肺急性加重的早期预警模型。
implementation site_1: 南华大学附属第二医院
implementation site_2: 南华大学附属第二医院
implementation site_3: 广州医科大学附属第一医院
randomization_method: N/A

title: Study for remote control of home blood pressure and management of hypertension based on Internet mobile platform
funded (original): 宁夏科技厅重点研发计划项目
study purpose: 针对我国高血压患者血压知晓率、治疗率、控制率低的特点，我院与浙江大学合作，联合开发高血压慢病管理移动互联平台和“血压助手”手机APP，对高血压患者的血压进行远程监控和分级管理，并加以健康知识推送，探讨移动互联平台与传统的门诊及电话随访相比对提升高血压患者血压达标率、治疗率和知晓率的临床意义，打造慢病管理示范平台。为我国慢病管理开辟一条创新之路。
randomization_method: Health managers were divided into control group and experimental group according to the randomized control table method.

title: The effect of Nordic walking on cardiac rehabilitation in patients with chronic heart failure under remote real-time electrocardio monitoring
study purpose: 1、通过远程实时心电监测下慢性心力衰竭患者在家庭进行北欧式步行训练，最终实现家庭运动心脏康复结构化、个性化、规范化； 2、提高慢性心力衰竭患者心脏康复参与率，有效的缓解症状，改善生活质量，提高运动耐量水平，减少心血管事件，降低死亡率和致残率； 3、探讨互联网+时代家庭运动心脏康复的可行性，探讨适合本地区乃至全国合适的心脏康复模式，改善患者预后，节约总的治疗成本。
implementation site_1: 南方医科大学顺德医院
randomization_method: The researchers will randomize 120 patients who met the inclusion criteria with a computer-generated random number，and randomly divide the patients (2:1) into Nordic walking training group (TG) and routine nursing control group (CG).

title: Real-time monitoring and just-in-time intervention for adherence to pre-exposure prophylaxis among men who have sex with men in China: a multicentre RCT study
funded (original): 博士后科学基金面上项目
study purpose: 评价“智能便携药盒”对于提高PrEP使用者服药依从性的效果。
implementation site_1: 中国医科大学附属第一医院
implementation site_2: 首都医科大学附属北京佑安医院
implementation site_4: 重庆市公共卫生医疗救治中心
randomization_method: Equilibrium random grouping: PASS 11.0 random grouping module will be used to equalize random grouping according to the way of taking medicine. Each way will have 500 people. Two groups of 500 random numbers are generated for random grouping of daily taking group and event-driven group.

title: The study of effectiveness of telestroke and continuous quality improvement
study purpose: 1.建立基于卒中远程医疗系统的卒中登记。 2.验证卒中远程医疗在重庆市的可行性和有效性。 3.建立持续质量改进的远程卒中医疗体系。
implementation site_1: 重庆医科大学附属第二医院
randomization_method: N/A

title: Development and practice of telemedicine chronic disease management service project for elderly patients with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease based on the characteristics of the spiritual health care
funded (original): 江南大学无锡医学院慢性病管理与康复研究室经费
study purpose: （1）构建远程肺康复干预方案，并评价方案对患者呼吸困难症状、自我效能、健康状况及生活质量的影响,为临床上开展远程肺康复干预提供借鉴、指导。 （2）制定针对老年COPD患者的远程灵性干预方案并评价方案的干预效果，促进灵性干预在COPD患者中的应用，为未来开展远程灵性干预提供证据支持、借鉴和新的思路。
implementation site_6: 黄巷街道社区卫生服务中心
randomization_method: The patients were randomly divided into the intervention group and the control group at a ratio of 1:1 by the computer generated random assignment sequence table, and the results were not known to the surveyors.
masking (original): 对结果测量者，患者实施盲法。

title: The effects of telerehabilitation on patients with knee osteoarthritis: a randomized controlled clinical trial
funded (original): 四川省科技厅科研项目
medical specialty (ICD-11): Diseases of the musculoskeletal system or connective tissue
study purpose: 本研究将开发本土化、个性化定制的基于物联网模式下膝骨关节炎康复治疗模式（包括学习自我管理、健康教育、运动疗法、远程康复指导、动态随访等）。通过前瞻性随机单盲对照试验评估物联网模式下膝骨关节炎康复治疗对患者疼痛、功能活动及生活质量的疗效；为物联网模式下膝骨关节炎的康复治疗提供符合中国国情的科学系统的理论框架与可行有效的干预证据；探索超声波和脉冲电磁场治疗膝骨关节炎的最佳治疗参数。同时，从患者、康复医生以及康复治疗师三个角度对基于物联网模式下膝骨关节炎康复治疗的使用反馈进行采集。
randomization_method: Random number generated by a computer.
masking (original): 单盲 谢苏杭医师：请说明施盲对象？

title: Research and Application of Key Technology for Nutrition and Weight Management of Long-range Diabetes Based on 'internet plus'
study purpose: 项目拟通过应用“云+端”的方式，基于健康云平台，糖尿病患者在社区卫生单位或家庭所测得多项糖尿病管理数据如血糖、血脂、膳食摄入、运动量、睡眠、体重变化等，将自动上传至数据中心，服务端利用数据进行糖尿病健康跟踪、预警、营养方案调整、运动方案调整以及双向转诊，期望通过采用“云+端”的方式对糖尿病患者加强营养和体重管理，以帮助糖尿病患者减少住院次数，减少服药量，延迟糖尿病并发症的发生或降低并发症的发生率，提高患者生活质量，促进糖尿病患者健康，减少国家卫生经济负担和糖尿病患者家庭经济负担。
implementation site_1: 九龙坡区渝州路街道社区卫生服务中心
randomization_method: Using computer to produce random numbers, T2DM patients were randomly divided into remote nutritional intervention group and control group

title: The effect of remoted-monitor pulmonary rehabilitation in family for stable COPD patients: a randomized controlled trial
funded (original): 中国宋庆龄基金会 呼吸疾病临床研究公益基金
study purpose: 通过单中心临床随机对照研究方法，借助远程家庭肺康复维持，突出患者自身管理模式，提高肺康复依从性，改善慢阻肺患者的症状，减低慢阻肺患者的急性加重频率，进而减轻慢阻肺疾病负担，达到建立多学科相互整合为特色的综合肺康复策略。
randomization_method: Randomization procedure was performed via random number generators(SPSS（17.0）) by statistical staff.

title: The management effectiveness of Automatic Remote Peritoneal Dialysis Follow-up system: A prospective cohort study
funded (original): 深圳市卫生与计划生育委员会
medical specialty (ICD-11): Factors influencing health status or contact with health services
study purpose: 基于我院自主研发的“实时远程智能随访系统（ARPDF系统）”，比较、探讨接受ARPDF系统随访，和接受传统PD随访模式的CAPD患者的临床管理效能。
randomization_method: No

title: A clinical study for the effect of remote monitoring on the prognosis of patients with stable coronary heart disease
funded (original): 成都尚医信息科技有限公司
study purpose: 研究基于信息科技远程监控下的运动对稳定性冠心病患者预后的影响，探讨信息科技应用于冠心病康复的可行性及有效性。
randomization_method: This trail use prospective, randomized, parallel controlled,and blind methods to evaluate the study. Patients matched the study criteria were divided into the remote monitoring exercise group and the traditional exercise intervention group by the computer random sequence method.

title: A Study for the Intervening Effect of Remote Visit on Anxiety and Depression of Critically Ill Newborn Parents
study purpose: 利用微信远程探视干预缓解新生儿重症监护室患儿父母焦虑、抑郁情绪。
randomization_method: computer generated random number

title: Effect of family remote rehabilitation based on collaborative nursing model on motor function recovery and quality of life in stroke patients
study purpose: 通过随机对照试验，干预组采用协同护理模式的家庭康复，对照组入住康复机构进行常规康复训练，根据干预后结果评价协同康复护理模式的安全性和有效性。
implementation site_1: 苏州大学附属第三医院
randomization_method: The random number table is used to generate random sequences by a specially-assigned person.

title: Effect of exercise therapy with remote monitoring on pain, physical function and quality of life in patients with knee arthritis
funded (original): 术康APP母公司 成都尚医信息科技有限公司
medical specialty (ICD-11): Diseases of the musculoskeletal system or connective tissue
study purpose: 本研究采用前瞻性、随机、对照、盲法评价研究，与传统门诊的膝关节炎运动干预方法、膝关节炎不运动干预对照，验证基于信息科技远程监控下的运动治疗介入在膝关节炎患者康复中应用的可能性，以及对膝关节炎患者疼痛、身体功能活动与生活品质的影响。
randomization_method: Jiaming Xu operates the computer simulation random grouping
masking (original): 本研究采用前瞻性、随机、对照、盲法评价研究，与传统门诊的膝关节炎运动干预方法、膝关节炎不运动干预对照，验证基于信息科技远程监控下的运动治疗介入在膝关节炎患者康复中应用的可能性，以及对膝关节炎患者疼痛、身体功能活动与生活品质的影响。

title: Development and evaluation of a Remote Family Integrated Life Review Program among advanced cancer patients

study purpose: 旨在评估采用手机APP综合管理血压及心血管危险因素模式对控制血压的影响。

implementation site_8: 西安交通大学第二附属医院

title: The research on the early warning value and intervention effect of the mobile and remote monitoring function of the implanted device on the common cardiovascular events in the elderly--Analysis of cardiac implant database and establishment of early warning indicators
study purpose: 主要目的：建立植入器械患者心脑血管高危事件早期预警指标。 次要目的：观察两年内心律失常的发生率如房颤，心衰的发生率，新发卒中事件，其他心血管事件。进行大数据评估分析：如住院率，发病率，死亡率。
randomization_method: The researchers randomly assigned not less than 1200 cases of heart implant of 4 hospitals (Beijing hospital, fuwai hospital, anzhen hospital and PuRen hospital)in Beijing during five years (age 60 or higher)

title: The research for the early warning value and intervention effect of the mobile and remote monitoring function of the implanted device on the common cardiovascular events in the elderly--Prospective multi-central control study of cardiac implanted devices.
study purpose: 主要目的：比较远程器械和非远程器械两组间一年内房颤和无症状房颤的发现 率以及发现时间。 次要目的：针对以上心血管事件进行干预，并比较两组间干预效果的差异（住院率、心律失常）。
randomization_method: nonrandom

title: The research on the early warning value and intervention effect of the mobile and remote monitoring function of the implanted device on the common cardiovascular events in the elderly.
study purpose: 主要目的：观察一年内晕厥/心悸相关的心律失常事件发现率，房颤发现率，首次晕厥/心悸相关的心律失常事件发现时间，首次房颤发现时间。 次要目的：比较两组干预治疗的效果差异，探索晕厥心悸原因、提出早期预警指标。
randomization_method: Nonrandam

funded (original): 上海申康医院发展中心促进市级医院临床技能与临床创新能力三年行动计划（16CR4020A）

title: The effect of remote monitoring on the prognosis of patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus clinical multicenter study

medical specialty (ICD-11): Symptoms, signs or clinical findings, not elsewhere classified

study purpose: 本研究将以整合式居家护理智能化管理平台的各方使用者体验为出发点,基于前期研究构建的居家护理管理模式，借助ICOPE居家护理智慧化管理平台，将整合式居家护理模式实际应用于居家护理服务全过程，同时及时采集病患信息、照护过程信息和其他相关数据信息，进行数据监控和数据分析。并基于数据分析，优化完善平台应用和评价。
randomization_method: A random number table (1 to 200 randomly ordered) was established in each community, and the staff responsible for geriatric management in the community (who were only responsible for informing the numbers) was in charge of it. Older people who were eligible for enrollment in the group were given a number according to the randomly ordered table of random numbers, with an odd number for the intervention group and an even number for the control group.
masking (original): 单盲：对纳入研究对象（内在能力下降的老年人）采用盲法。

study purpose: 1.探索基于健康相关行为生态学模式的青少年自杀自伤干预策略； 2.开发“互联网+”青少年心身康复治疗技术； 3.验证“互联网+”心身康复治疗对青少年自杀自伤的临床疗效。

randomization_method: A psychiatrist or psychotherapist USES a random number table.

title: Application of Internet-based singing therapy to pulmonary rehabilitation of patients with stable chronic obstructive pulmonary disease
funded (original): 南京中医药大学附属医院
study purpose: 本研究旨于探讨将互联网移动APP为媒介开展歌唱疗法对COPD稳定期患者的应用效果，以期通过本研究进一步进行歌唱疗法的疗效验证，并突破传统护理模式，丰富“互联网+”护理的实证研究。

randomization_method: The serial number of the subjects was prepared in advance and random numbers were generated using SPSS26.0. Odd numbers were assigned to the experimental group and even numbers were assigned to the control group.
masking (original): 因歌唱疗法的特殊性，盲法对研究人员及研究对象不适用，对数据收集者及结果测评者适用。

randomization_method: The 88 PPD subjects will be randomly divided into 2 groups with 44 cases in each group according to a random number table.
masking (original): 本研究遵循盲法原则，整个研究过程中严格实行研究者、操作者和统计者三分离。

randomization_method: Patients meeting inclusion and exclusion criteria were divided into an intervention group and a control group using a random number table.

title: Application of breast cancer whole course management based on Internet

title: Application of rehabilitation guidance on remote platform in patients with stroke

study purpose: 1. 主要目的:探究基于互联网平台的康复指导相比于常规出院康复指导对脑卒中 患者运动功能、移动能力、日常活动能力和生活质量的影响，以验证基于互联网平台的 康复指导对脑卒中患者中的治疗效果。 2. 次要目的:通过调查参与者对于基于互联网平台的康复指导的依从性，分析不良事件发生的频次，探究基于互联网平台的康复指导在未来推广的可行性和安全性。
implementation site_3: 西南医科大学附属医院
implementation site_5: 成都市双流区第一人民医院
randomization_method: Minimization: Randomized grouping was completed by independent researchers using online randomization program. The type of research center (provincial/municipal/district level) was used as the only covariate to make the three types of research centers evenly distributed in the two groups.

funded (original): 首都卫生发展科研专项(编号：首发2022-2- 2046）
medical specialty (ICD-11): Factors influencing health status or contact with health services

randomization_method: The number of weeks in which subjects were included was numbered from 1 to 20. SPSS 26.0 was used to generate a random sequence of 1 or 2, with 1 representing the control group and 2 representing the experimental group. All patients who met the inclusion criteria and gave informed consent within the same week were included in the corresponding group.

implementation site_1: 中国中医科学院西苑医院
implementation site_2: 中国中医科学院广安门医院
implementation site_3: 中国中医科学院望京医院
randomization_method: A simple random method to generate random sequences by the research nurse.

title: Efficacy evaluation of early respiratory rehabilitation combined with Internet-based patient management model in patients with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease: a pragmatic, multicenter, randomized controlled trial
study purpose: 主要目的： 1.评估使用早期呼吸康复方案的慢阻肺急性加重期住院患者90天内急性加重次数或再入院率； 2. 对比传统呼吸康复，基于互联网的呼吸康复干预对慢阻肺患者长期预后的效果。 次要目的： 1.评估早期呼吸康复方案对因急性发作入院的COPD患者生活质量的改善作用； 2.评价康复计划在实际诊疗环境中不同随访模式下的完成度； 3.分析早期呼吸康复及互联网的患者管理模式与常规管理COPD患者的经济性差异，为医疗卫生系统的决策提供信息。
randomization_method: For patients who meet the inclusion and exclusion criteria and provide informed consent, each study centre will strictly assign random codes in order. The random grouping results will be generated by the central randomization system according to the central hierarchical dynamic randomization (minimization method) after the randomization form is submitted by the Electronic Data Capture System (EDCS) after enrolment to ensure close balance between groups. In principle, the number of centres enrolled should be evenly distributed as much as possible to ensure sufficient centre representation. Considering the feasibility and selection progress, the number of enrolled units will be adjusted according to the actual situation.
masking (original): 由于呼吸康复及基于互联网的患者管理模式难以设盲，所有研究分组均设置为开放标签。

title: Effect of Internet-based health management on the prognosis of patients after PCI
funded (original): 青岛市科技惠民示范引导专项资金
target Disease / conditions: Prognosis of patients with coronary heart disease after PCI
study purpose: 探讨基于互联网的医护康一体化管理对患者预后的影响，以互联网为载体和技术手段，对PCI术后患者进行线上和线下的较大规模、较长周期的医护康一体化干预。通过记录受试者术后1月、3月、6月、12月血糖、血脂、血压检测情况并记录受试者术后复发MACE心绞痛、急性心肌梗死、再血管化、严重心律失常、心力衰竭、心源性死亡、心脏原因导致的再住院等MACE事件来评估干预方式的有效性。
randomization_method: Stratified randomization was adopted in this clinical trial: stratified according to age group, emergency / elective PCI, and enrolled by random sequence generated by computer software. The grouping is only disclosed to the data administrator (chi Wei) and hidden from the researchers and subjects.
masking (original): 采用双盲临床试验，所有干预措施预制在微信小程序中，受试者需要执行和试验人员实施的干预程序，由小程序下达。揭盲前受试者和试验者都不知道分组信息。

title: Effect of continuous nursing based on 'Internet plus' on health outcomes of discharged patients with nasopharyngeal carcinoma in China

study purpose: (1)构建医院-家庭鼻咽癌全程护理一体化平台，实现医院对患者的信息、管理及关系的延续照护。 (2)开展基于互联网平台的医院-家庭联动全程护理干预，为患者提供住院-出院连续性、个性化、整体化的健康护理服务；建立全程照护管理模式，评价其对并发症发生率、依从性、症状困扰、生活质量等多项指标的影响。 (3)构建鼻咽癌患者全程护理标准，为医护人员同质化护理提供依据。
implementation site_1: 广西医科大学第一附属医院
randomization_method: Use SPSS20.0 software to generate random numbers for random grouping.

title: Construction of an Internet-based management platform for patients with acute pancreatitis after discharge and prognosis research for patients with acute pancreatitis
study purpose: 1）基于互联网建立急性胰腺炎出院后管理平台,失访的危险因素； 2）急性胰腺炎出院后患者报告结局的发生率,急性胰腺炎出院后再入院发生率及生存质量。
implementation site_1: 南昌大学第一附属医院
randomization_method: N/A

title: Research and Promotion of the integrated intervention model of combining education and family with medical treatment for children with ADHD basing on Internet+
funded (original): 上海市卫生健康委员会
study purpose: 本研究在前期研究基础上，拟将干预年龄进一步前移至4岁，依托互联网医院平台和校园服务站，在筛查、诊断、治疗和随访方面进一步优化ADHD医教家一体化，在行为治疗方面进一步深化医教家一体化，让行为治疗走进学校，走进家庭，在静安区中小幼校园全面推广ADHD医教家一体化，提高ADHD疾病知晓度，增加ADHD治疗的依从性和缓解率，规范诊疗流程。
randomization_method: Not used

title: The impact study of ''Internet +'' baduanjin on aged in the community balance ability
funded (original): 广东省疾病预防控制中心、广州市疾病预防控制中心
medical specialty (ICD-11): Factors influencing health status or contact with health services
study purpose: 利用Mixed模型对重复测量数据进行分析，定量比较不同干预模式下，八段锦锻炼对社区老年人平衡能力及依从性影响程度差异。
implementation site_1: 广州市疾病预防控制中心
randomization_method: a physician who does not participate in the research process carry out random grouping by using computer-generated random numbers

title: Research on the Establishment of Internet + TCM chronic disease Management Model of small cell lung Cancer

study purpose: 观察中药在小细胞肺癌治疗中的临床疗效
implementation site_1: 中国中医科学院广安门医院
implementation site_2: 中国医学科学院肿瘤医院
randomization_method: No

title: The clinical study of overall management for osteoporotic patients based on 'Internet Plus'

study purpose: 基于微信服务号对骨质疏松病人进行随访，提高骨质疏松病人的诊疗水平。

title: A randomized controlled trial for determination of the clinical effect of Internet-assisted pulmonary rehabilitation on patients with novel coronavirus pneumonia (COVID-19)
study purpose: 该研究拟利用互联网技术，以自助式呼吸康复组为对照组，评估互联网辅助下呼吸康复对轻型及普通型新型冠状病毒肺炎患者的临床干预效果。拟证明该呼吸康复模式可以有效减轻患者的心理困扰，提高心肺功能，降低急性加重比例，长远获益可以提高患者生活质量。
implementation site_1: 中国医科大学附属第一医院
randomization_method: Randomized with envelopes

title: The comprehensive prevention and control of hypertension with “Internet + family doctor”
study purpose: 搭建并完善基于互联网的高血压及冠心病早期管理平台，同时开发针对高血压及冠心病高危对象的防治技术，评价其干预效果，并示范、推广。
implementation site_1: 成都市武侯区华兴社区卫生服务中心
implementation site_2: 成都市武侯区簇桥社区医院
implementation site_3: 成都市武侯区簇锦社区医院
randomization_method: his study is a cluster randomized controlled study. Random Numbers of 3 communities selected by each sub-center were generated by professional statisticians of West China Hospital, Sichuan University . Random sequences were generated using SAS 9.4 software and the whole community was randomly divided into intervention

title: Improving the health of patient with heart disease through intelligent remote ischemic conditioning: the i-RIC trial
study purpose: 1. 探索互联网+模式下的全疾病周期智慧RIC训练对急性心肌梗塞患者的有效性: (1) 探索互联网+模式下的全疾病周期智慧RIC训练方案对急性心肌梗塞PCI手术患者各类心脑血管事件发生率（包括主要心脑血管事件发生率、全因死亡率、心肌梗死再发率、心衰再住院率、缺血性脑卒中发生率、计划外PCI手术或CABG手术率）的影响； (2) 探索互联网+模式下的全疾病周期智慧RIC训练方案对急性心肌梗塞PCI手术患者心肌梗塞相关血清学指标、心梗面积、心功能、心肺耐力、生存质量的影响； (3) 明确互联网+模式下的全疾病周期智慧RIC训练方案治疗的安全性及依从性。 2. 探索互联网+模式下的全疾病周期智慧RIC训练方案治疗急性心肌梗塞患者的社会经济学效益 (1) 通过成本/效果及成本/效用分析探索互联网+模式下的全疾病周期智慧RIC训练方案的社会经济学效益。
implementation site_1: 南京医科大学第一附属医院
implementation site_5: 福建省泉州市第一医院
randomization_method: Randomization procedure will be undertaken using a web-based randomization system (http://www.randomizer.org/) and independently administered by the Clinical Research Board from School of Public Health in Nanjing Medical University.
masking (original): 实施评估的试验助手和进行随机分组的第三方工作人员不会与两组患者接触。基于所实施的干预的性质，患者对自身入组情况知情。由于在PCI术中进行球囊扩张时，需同时对患者进行一次RIC干预，实施手术的外科医生对患者的入组情况知情。在各个分中心，对试验组患者进行干预的医疗人员（即护士或理疗师）不允许与对照组患者进行接触，使各种潜在的偏见降至最低。数据录入和统计分析专家对患者入组情况不知情。

title: A national multi-center clinical study on the effect of health education and management of internet social media on the treatment and prognosis of atopic dermatitis in children
study purpose: 本研究的主要目的是寻找一种简单易行高效的教育模式指导特应性皮炎患儿及其家庭学会自我管理，以更好的防止皮炎复发。
implementation site_1: 重庆医科大学附属儿童医院
implementation site_2: 首都医科大学北京儿童医院
implementation site_3: 中国医科大学附属盛京医院
implementation site_4: 复旦大学附属儿科医院
implementation site_5: 浙江大学医学院附属儿童医院
randomization_method: Non-participants (non-patients and their families, researchers, outcome assessors) generated random numbers through a computer.

title: Study for the effect of Moxibustion Guidance and Intervention based on internet for the discharged patients with novel coronavirus pneumonia (COVID-19)
study purpose: 基于互联网模式对2019-nCoV肺炎出院居家康复患者进行临床灸法指导干预，观察灸法对本病患者改善临床症状及心理情绪方面的临床效应，对提高临床疗效、改善患者心理情绪有良好的临床意义和社会价值，同时为康复居家隔离患者的灸法干预提供科学的依据。
randomization_method: N/A

title: The effects of telemedicine into continuous nursing on wound healing of diabetic foot
study purpose: 以远程医疗为基础，探索互联网融入延续性护理对糖尿病足伤口愈合的有效性。
randomization_method: Non-randomized controlled trial. The researcher herself, liu lili, included patients who met the admission criteria in the order of admission, and included one in the intervention group and the next in the control group.Patients unable to complete the intervention were included in the control group.

title: Construction and application of non-contact doctor-patient interactive diagnosis and treatment mode of moxibustion therapy for novel coronary pneumonia (COVID-19) based on mobile internet
study purpose: 以艾灸疗法作为介入，发挥“中医治未病”特色，建立基于移动互联网络新冠肺炎非接触式医患互动诊疗模式并运用。
randomization_method: none

title: Study on Platform Management System by Internet plus for Depression Screening Treatment and Research
study purpose: ①.通过公众号软件，利用互联网+平台管理模式，促进对抑郁症患者的关注，达到对抑郁症易感人群的早期筛查，及早诊治，提升抑郁症的早期识别率和就医率； ②.建立抑郁症筛查治疗研究平台，实现信息化管理及云服务,进行大数据分析，深入对抑郁症患者及其相关群体的基础及临床研究，促进政府加大对抑郁症患者的相关医疗政策支持。
randomization_method: N/A

title: Research on MTM Services for Inpatients Based on 'internet+' technology
funded (original): 天津医科大学朱宪彝纪念医院科研基金
study purpose: 基于“互联网+”技术对我院收治的2型糖尿病患者进行药物治疗管理服务（MTM）。药师在患者住院及出院后，借助前置审方、移动临床药学、药学服务微信等软件系统对其进行用药评估、药物精简、药物重整、用药指导等服务；并将多种形式的科普宣教贯穿整个研究始终。
implementation site_1: 天津医科大学朱宪彝纪念医院
randomization_method: Upon admission, according to the principle of random concealment, the formulator of the distribution table (not participating in the study) followed the random number table prepared in advance, and informed the researcher that the current patient should be assigned to the intervention group or control group accordi

title: The Construction and An Empirical Study of Couple's Sexual Health Education Model for Young Women with Breast Cancer Based on Internet
study purpose: 本研究针对年轻乳腺癌患者夫妻，通过扎根理论研究 、现况调查、Delphi专家咨询等研究方法，探讨性健康信息行为机制，构建覆盖疾病、性生理 、性心理、夫妻沟通与支持应对4个维度的性健康教育干预方案，依托互联网按照护理程序开 展实证研究，形成科学规范的性健康教育模式。以期解决肿瘤护理领域中性健康管理难题，提 高年轻乳腺癌患者及配偶的生活质量，促进家庭和谐，社会稳定。
implementation site_1: 南京医科大学附属肿瘤医院
randomization_method: Statisticians use SPSS22.0 statistical software programming generating random Numbers, numbered from 1 to 82 in the software, then set A fixed value in the random data generator, then calculate variables, use function to generate random Numbers, row rank and recode the case for different variables, the old valu

title: Construction of health management model of Internet + centering pregnancy in advanced maternal age
study purpose: 本研究旨在通过阅读文献、设计问卷、调查高龄孕妇具体健康需求，构建“互联网”+“集中群组式健康教育”管理模式，分析其在高龄孕妇这一群体中的作用，改善高龄孕妇的妊娠结局、提高母婴健康素养以及高龄孕妇对医务人员和医疗环境的满意度。
randomization_method: Generate random number tables using Excel.

title: Lowering Future Disease-Related Risks in COPD Patients in The Community Using Information Technology Platform
study purpose: 基于我国目前慢阻肺患病率高、死亡率高、漏诊率高、疾病负担重、基层慢阻肺管理严重不足的现状，结合互联网+技术，建立连接三级医院与基层医疗机构的慢阻肺管理平台。在基层医院门诊纳入符合标准的患者，随机分组到试验组或对照组，对照组患者给予常规规范化管理，试验组患者在对照组基础上结合可穿戴设备，记录患者不同时间点，不同生活状态下的指脉氧，并且通过手机APP平台记录患者症状，设计预警值，早期识别患者病情变化，采取干预措施，降低患者未来风险以及疾病负担。
implementation site_1: 什刹海社区卫生服务中心
implementation site_2: 新街口社区卫生服务中心
implementation site_3: 北太平庄社区卫生服务中心
implementation site_4: 甘家口社区卫生服务中心
randomization_method: The community health service centers were divided into groups by cluster randomization method. The project leader randomly selected 6 community health service centers by random comparison table, and determined 3 community health service centers as the experimental group and 3 as the control group.

title: The intervention effects of web-based mindfulness intervention on physical and mental symptoms among recurrent abortion patients.

study purpose: RPL患者随着流产次数的增多，不良身心症状的发生率呈上升趋势。本研究在评估RPL患者的身心状况，并筛选身心症状的影响因素的基础上，拟探讨一种适用于在RPL患者中大规模推广的简易正念训练方法，并探讨可能的干预机制。

The study plans to include 4 centers of hypertensive patients, randomized according to the pinyin letters of each center name; second, the test cases are randomly coded. title: Development and evaluation for Internet-based supportive care program among adult patients with acute leukemia and their families caregivers
funded (original): 福建省卫生计生中青年骨干人才培养项目（批准号： 2018-ZQN-63）

title: The Response of Internet-based Cognitive Behavioral Therapy for Insomnia (CBT-I) Application in Different Populations
funded (original): 杭州市科技发展计划项目
study purpose: 基于互联网的CBT-I对失眠的疗效已得到证实，与传统面对面的个体CBT-I相比，具有节约资源、方便获取等优点，对轻中度的失眠患者疗效较好。为了更好地推广基于互联网的CBT-I移动模式，快速准确地筛选出适宜人群，本课题将通过挖掘不同人群对基于互联网的CBT-I移动模式的响应，探寻最适宜这一干预方式的人群特征，指导临床为失眠患者选择合适的CBT-I干预方式。

Masked envelopes will be produced by random concealment and participants are admitted by 1:1 random principle. After screening for inclusion and exclusion criteria

title: Group treatment combined with internet interactive feedback on psychological intervention for perimenopausal women, an open-label, randomized controlled trial
target Disease / conditions: Anxiety and depression in perimenopausal women
study purpose: 1）根据实验样本，了解南京市围绝经期综合征的发病率并及心理状况的情况。 2）探索对围绝经期女性进行团体心理疏导联合互联网互动反馈治疗的有效性和可操作性。 3）对围绝经期综合征的治疗和心理干预提出切实可行的建议。
randomization_method: According to the principle of simple randomization, the random number generated by random number table is divided into two groups according to 1:1 ratio.

title: Clinical efficacy of Philicare-UFG andthe balanced metabolic management under the mobile Internet mode for overweight patients with type 2 diabetes orprediabetes

title: A Community-Based Non-randomized Controlled Clinical Trial in China: The Impact of Ambulatory Blood Pressure Monitoring and Home Blood Pressure Monitoring Combined with Internet Technology on Blood Pressure Management
funded (original): 中国国家重点研发计划
study purpose: 本研究将在中国社区进行高血压筛查，并应用统一标准的24小时动态血压计和家庭智能血压计，结合互联网远程数据传输技术，对入组人群实施远程血压监测和管理，评估这种基于社区的新型血压管理模式在改善中国人群高血压控制水平方面的作用。
implementation site_1: 新街口社区卫生服务中心
randomization_method: According to the patients's willing, patients who are willing to take intervention management enrolled in the intervention group, who are unwilling to undergo intervention management enrolled in the control group.

title: Internet-based HIV Prevention among men who have sex with men
study purpose: 评估互联网干预对MSM人群高危行为的效果，为MSM人群艾滋病防治提供参考建议。 研究目标： 1)了解MSM人群使用互联网的特征； 2)了解使用互联网的MSM人群高危行为的危险因素； 3)采用随机、对照的方法，对MSM人群进行干预，评估互联网干预对MSM人群高危行为的效果。
implementation site_1: 广州市疾病预防控制中心
randomization_method: Simple randomization method，peformed by postgraduate student Zhangyin Chen, by using SPSS to generate a set of random digit and divided into two groups.
masking (original): 这是一项“开放标签”设计。

title: Effect of Easy TellTM (v2.0): an Internet based anonymous sexual partner notification system on promoting sexual partner notification among HIV positive men who have sex with men in Guangzhou City: a randomized controlled trial
funded (original): 广州市卫生计生科技一般引导项目
study purpose: 本研究通过随机对照试验，评估升级版匿名性伴告知平台——易告知TM（v2.0）和对广州市HIV阳性MSM性伴告知的促进效果，为进一步优化平台服务，建立高效可行的广州市HIV阳性MSM性伴告知工作模式提供科学依据。
implementation site_1: 广州市疾病预防控制中心
randomization_method: Random integer from 1 to 10 was generated by Microsoft Excel for each sample. The sample with the random integers which were below the median were assigned to control group. The others were allocated to intervention group. The allocation list was prepared by an investigator with no involvement in the
masking (original): 单盲，不向研究对象透露其研究分组。

title: Criteria of diagnosis and treatment and epidemiological screening for children in Chongqing with nocturnal enuresis, based on the 'Internet +' and 'three referral pattern'
funded (original): 重庆市科学委员会基金
study purpose: ①向一级医院医生（社区、乡镇等基层医院医生）、二级医院医生推广儿童夜遗尿诊治治疗，当地医院建立夜遗尿专科门诊，通过“三级转诊模式”实行分级治疗； ②通过“互联网+”慢病管理平台对夜遗尿症进行慢病管理，创立针对儿童夜遗尿症的长期健康管理创新模式。 ③获得我市儿童夜遗尿流行病学资料。
implementation site_1: 重庆医科大学附属儿童医院
randomization_method: no

study purpose: 利用互联网平台将初中患者及其家长一起加入微信群，有计划、定期推送疾病相关的正确知识，并定期回复患者及家长的咨询。通过这样的研究期望寻找一种新的针对青春期痤疮患者健康教育方式，更高效地帮助青春期痤疮患者,使其获得正确的疾病知识，并提高其就医依从性。
implementation site_1: 中国医学科学院皮肤病医院
randomization_method: Research objects are randomly divided into the intervention group and control group with random number sequence by the researcher.

title: Research on chronic disease management by internet and application of diuretics in people with hypertension

randomization_method: The random number sequence generated automatically by application of MedSci.

title: The Internet supporting establishment of prevention-and-control system for diabetic foot.

randomization_method: The study leader generates random sequences through the computer system based on the block randomization

title: Nutrition and Exercise Intervention of Hypertension Based on Mobile Devices and Internet Technology in Community
funded (original): 重庆市科学技术委员会
study purpose: 本项目使用基于自行开发的基于穿戴设备和智能手机的高血压管理系统，通过采集高血压病人的血压，运动，心率，运动，饮食等方面的信息，并基于上述信息，为病人提供个性化的饮食运动的反馈意见和指导方案，以帮助社区卫生服务中心有效管理社区高血压病人。该研究的目的包括： 1、明确该高血压病管理系统在社区应用可行性。 2、评估该系统的管理效果。 3、对该系统进行成本效益分析。 4、对该系统进行优化和升级。
implementation site_1: 重庆市渝中区石油路社区卫生服务中心
implementation site_2: 重庆市南岸区弹子石社区卫生服务中心
randomization_method: Taking community as a unit, randomly distribute community into the intervention/control group.

title: The Effects of the Diversity Exercise Intervention Based on the Internet and Social Media Software on postoperative Patients with Breast Cancer
funded (original): 国家科技基础性工作专项重点课题（2015FY111600）
study purpose: 通过随机对照试验验证基于互联网及社交媒体软件的多样性运动干预对乳腺癌术后患者在体力活动、生活质量等方面的康复作用。
randomization_method: Study leader generates the random number sequence by using a random digits table

title: Development and evaluation of an Internet-Based Life Review Program among cancer patients undergoing chemotherapy

title: Multi-center study of internet-based lifestyle intervention for PCOS patients
