title: Investigation of the clinical effect and mechanism of combining multi-module 3D virtual reality (VR) and repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation for the treatment of post-stroke memory disorders
study purpose: 拟采用 3D 虚拟现实（Virtual Reality ，VR）技术结合重复经颅磁刺激（rTMS）技术，求证其对脑卒中后注意力、记忆力障碍的康复疗效，探讨其可能机制，为注意力、记忆力障碍的康复寻找更方便、更简洁、更有效的治疗方法，从而减轻患者压力、家庭负担及社会负担。
randomization_method: In order to reduce the risk of selective bias, the statisticians who did not participate in this study used spss21.0 statistical software to program, so as to generate the number of random grouping sequence of the subjects.

title: Clinical study of upper limb rehabilitation robot based on virtual reality technology combined with transcranial direct current stimulation on upper extremity dysfunction in patients with ischemic stroke
funded (original): 国家科技部重点研发计划[课题号（No.: 2018YFC2001600 & 2018YFC2001603）
study purpose: 主要目的：探讨基于虚拟现实技术的上肢康复机器人联合经颅直流电刺激对缺血性脑卒中患者上肢功能康复的疗效及作用机制。
randomization_method: A doctor who did not participate in this trial used a computer to generate random blocks.
masking (original): 单盲，对研究对象进行设盲

title: Immersive virtual reality for delivering upper limb motor rehabilitation exercises in poststroke patients
study purpose: 这项研究的目的是评估基于沉浸式的虚拟现实技术在中风后患者上肢运动康复方面的可行性，安全性以及有效性。
randomization_method: Randomization will be employed with randomly permuted blocks of four and six.

title: Virtual Reality-based aphasia rehabilitation training to evaluate the effectiveness for Broca aphasia patients
funded (original): 中南大学；湖南省卫生健康委
study purpose: 本研究旨在通过构建虚拟现实言语功能康复训练系统来评估和改善脑卒中失语患者言语功能。采用量性和质性研究相结合的研究方法，依托虚拟现实技术，建立失语患者个性化的言语康复方案，评价虚拟现实康复训练系统言语康复的有效性、患者依从性、患者沟通能力、患者的满意度、人力资源节省等方面的干预效果。
randomization_method: Using computer generated random number method

title: Study on the rehabilitation effect of situational interactive virtual reality training on the gait of children with cerebral palsy
funded (original): 山东省重点研发计划《脑瘫儿童步态运动功能障碍的精准量化评估关键技术研究》
study purpose: 评估基于情景互动式虚拟现实技术对学龄期脑瘫儿童常规康复治疗的支持作用；使用虚拟现实纠正学龄期脑瘫患儿的异常步态模式，改善脑瘫患儿下肢的步行功能障碍；探索学龄期脑瘫儿童产生步行障碍的运动生物力学机制，实现定量化测试，为脑瘫青少年期康复的科学化、个性化提供依据。
randomization_method: Not stated

title: The effect of virtual reality-based intervention technology on psychological craving of alcohol-dependent patients
funded (original): 河南省精神心理疾病临床医学研究中心
study purpose: 开发一套诱发酒精渴求的虚拟现实系统，对酒精使用障碍患者进行干预，了解该干预模式在降低渴求、预防复饮方面的疗效。
implementation site_1: 新乡医学院第二附属医院
randomization_method: The project implementers were randomly assigned by a coin toss method

title: Study on the clinical effects of Virtual Reality (VR) alcohol Withdrawal system
study purpose: 本研究拟通过设计标准的虚拟现实环境，利用线索暴露疗法及厌恶疗法，对酒精成瘾人群进行干预，并通过比较不同VR场景下酒依赖患者的主观渴求、生理指标、行为指标的变化，分析差异，探明虚拟现实技术的线索暴露疗法对降低酒精使用障碍者线索反应的作用，进一步探明虚拟现实技术的线索暴露疗法对降低酒精使用障碍者复饮的作用。
randomization_method: The allocation will be accomplished using a randomisation table generated by a computeraized sequence generator at 1:1 ratio.

title: Metabonomics study of virtual Reality VR assisted trazodone in the treatment of insomnia disorder
funded (original): 上海市嘉定区卫生健康委员会
study purpose: 1、分析失眠障碍虚拟现实辅助曲唑酮治疗治疗前后血浆代谢标志物的变化； 2、探讨失眠障碍导致代谢通路异常的分子机制； 3、研究 VR 和 VR 辅助曲唑酮治疗干预的疗效与分子水平异常代谢通路的关系； 4、建立失眠障碍发病和治疗过程中的分子水平作用机制，为有效干预失眠障碍提供理论依据。
implementation site_1: 上海市健康医学院附属嘉定区中心医院
randomization_method: Using computer to generate random numbers and grouping by odd number and even number.

title: Effects of biophilic virtual Reality on cognitive function of patients after laparoscopic surgery and fMRI evaluation
study purpose: 通过亲生态环境虚拟现实技术为腹腔镜手术患者提供认知康复新途径； 通过ASL技术对围术期脑血流灌注参数值和神经纤维各参数值进行动态比较，从分子影像角度分析其作为POCD发展的生物标记物的敏感性和准确性，为将来的精准医疗提供理论依据。
implementation site_1: 宁波大学医学院附属医院
randomization_method: After the objects are included, they are randomly grouped according to the number in the envelope.

title: Clinical Application, Norms and Standards of Virtual Reality Rehabilitation Training System for Depression
study purpose: 1. 研发基于虚拟现实的抑郁障碍心理治疗系统，探索抑郁障碍心理治疗的新平台。 2. 通过随机、对照临床试验，评价基于虚拟现实的抑郁障碍心理治疗其安全性和有效性及其对抑郁障碍患者大脑功能的影响，为制定相应临床规范和标准提供循证医学证据。
randomization_method: 1:1 blocked randomization，computer-generated random sequence by a researcher who will not participate patient recruitment.

title: Virtual reality training for individuals with chronic neck pain: a randomized controlled trial
medical specialty (ICD-11): Diseases of the musculoskeletal system or connective tissue
study purpose: 基于《国际功能、残疾和健康分类》（International Classification of Functioning, Disability and Health,ICF)的理论框架，从由颈椎病引起颈痛的患者的颈部运动功能出发，运用近年来新兴的虚拟现实技术，通过单盲随机对照临床试验明确其治疗慢性颈痛患者的短期和长期的有效性。
randomization_method: The study leader will use random number table to generate random distribution sequence
masking (original): 单盲 (结局指标评估者盲)

title: Research on the Intervention of Virtual Reality Technology Based on TCM Syndrome Differentiation on Cardiovascular Severe Diseases
funded (original): 浙江省中医药管理局项目
study purpose: （1）探索并证实结合中医辨证论治的虚拟现实新技术在心血管重症治疗方面的客观疗效和证据，最终使临床患者获益。 （2）探索出不同虚拟场景对不同中医辨证疾病的有效性。 （3）初步探索虚拟现实技术对围术期患者的疗效评价体系并探究。
implementation site_1: 浙江中医药大学附属第二医院
randomization_method: According to the inclusion and exclusion criteria, the patients in and out groups will be selected, and the selected groups will be changed weekly.

title: Study on the intervention of virtual reality technology in perioperative period of cardiac intervention patients
study purpose: 近年来，中国心血管疾病患病率及死亡率仍处于持续上升阶段。而心脏介入治疗作为心血管疾病诊疗的有效手段，现已在临床广泛应用。如何优化心脏介入患者围术期的治疗管理，提升患者依从性、舒适性及满意度是临床的迫切需求。虚拟现实技术( Virtual Reality VR)是以计算机技术为核心,结合图形学、仿真技术、传感技术等多学科交叉的一项前沿科技。目前VR治疗主要用于辅助镇痛及康复领域，在心血管疾病中仅涉及心脏康复，国内外关于未见VR在心脏介入手术围手术期的应用的研究。为探索更为有效的心脏介入围术期治疗管理方案，将VR治疗引入其中。
implementation site_1: 浙江中医药大学附属第二医院
randomization_method: According to the inclusion and exclusion criteria, the patients in and out groups were selected, and the selected groups were changed weekly. According to the inclusion and exclusion criteria, the patients in and out groups were selected, and the selected groups were changed weekly.

title: Virtual reality in preoperative preparation of children with general anesthesia to improve perioperative outcomes: a randomized controlled trial
study purpose: 本研究将VRE用于择期住院手术患儿，观察患儿术前焦虑及术后疼痛等的结果。
randomization_method: The subjects were grouped by a researcher using computer-generated random numbers.

title: Study on the efficacy of virtual reality technology in promoting coma and awakening in children with craniocerebral injury
funded (original): 国家或省市级科研基金
medical specialty (ICD-11): Injury, poisoning or certain other consequences of external causes
study purpose: 应用HTC Vive搭建虚拟现实平台，通过还原生活场景，促进颅脑损伤儿童早期昏迷促醒。
implementation site_1: 南京医科大学附属儿童医院
randomization_method: The random sequence will be generated by using the random number table.

title: Prospective Clinical Study of Evaluating the effects of virtual-reality-training on paretic upper limb motor function of stroke survivors from brain activation and motor control changes
study purpose: 探讨脑卒中后神经系统损伤影响运动控制与运动表现层次上的神经及生物力学机制，围绕偏瘫运动参数、痉挛肌肉的牵张反射兴奋性、脑激活区的特征性变化，探讨关节运动功能与皮层兴奋的交互影响关系、皮层状态对脊髓层面反射活动的影响，以及虚拟现实干预的评估和效应分析
implementation site_1: 中山大学附属第一医院
randomization_method: During the procedure of research, statistical work, and intervention work, and assessment work will be performed by different groups independently. Randomization work will be performed by statistical professionals, who work independently from statistical processing work, treatment and intervention work.

title: Research on the effect of virtual reality technology on cognitive function and central remodeling model of convert stroke based on rs-fMRI
study purpose: 本项目通过与非隐匿性中风人群的对比，全面了解隐匿性中风的特点；基于静息态磁共振技术，观察虚拟现实技术对隐匿性中风的认知功能及中枢重塑模式的作用。
implementation site_1: 上海中医药大学附属岳阳中西医结合医院
randomization_method: N/A

title: A Clinical Trial of Virtual Reality Visual Function Training and Treatment Software for Children with Amblyopia
funded (original): 广州视景医疗软件有限公司
study purpose: 评价视觉功能训练治疗软件（型号：SJ-VRS2018）联合遮盖疗法对儿童弱视治疗的安全性和有效性，联合疗效是否优效于遮盖疗法。
implementation site_5: 广州中医药大学第一附属医院
randomization_method: Masking:Triple (Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor) Masking Description: Research centers are used as a stratification factor. The researchers include subjects in the trial group or control group based on randomized envelopes.

title: Application of Virtual Reality in non-drug Behavioral Management of dental procedure in Children
funded (original): 重庆医科大学附属口腔医院
medical specialty (ICD-11): Factors influencing health status or contact with health services
study purpose: VR干预在牙科手术非药物行为管理中的作用
implementation site_1: 重庆医科大学附属口腔医院
randomization_method: Patients will be randomly allocated to two conditions by Project leaders are using the randomization software

title: A randomized, double-blind, controlled trial for transcranial direct current stimulation (tDCS) for meth addiction intervention based on virtual reality scene arousal (VR)
funded (original): 上海市精神卫生中心研究经费和戒毒所
study purpose: 探究VR-tDCS对冰毒成瘾的治疗效果，通过比较VR-tDCS真刺激组及VR-tDCS伪刺激组的疗效在治疗前、治疗后及治疗后二个月的临床指标、心率变异性指标、神经心理指标和副反应的差异显著性。
implementation site_1: 浙江省十里坪强制隔离戒毒所
randomization_method: Third party experimenter use a random number table method to generate random sequences.

title: Clinical study for virtual reality rehabilitation training system for central nerve system injury
funded (original): 军委后勤保障部课题资助
study purpose: 研究虚拟现实康复训练系统对中枢神经损伤功能恢复的影响
implementation site_1: 第四军医大学西京医院
randomization_method: Patients in accordance with the inclusion and exclusion criteria, according to the order of treatment according to the random number table. Randomly divided into groups.

title: A randomized, controlled, double-blind clinical trial for transcranial direct current stimulation (tDCS) for meth addiction intervention based on virtual reality scene arousal (VR)
study purpose: （1）主要研究目的：比较干预三周后，VR-tDCS真刺激、VR-tDCS伪刺激和VR对照对冰毒成瘾患者干预疗效的差异。 （2）次要研究目的：评估VR-tDCS真刺激干预冰毒成瘾患者的安全性及认知功能的变化。
implementation site_1: 浙江省十里坪强制隔离戒毒所
randomization_method: The researchers used a random number table method to generate random sequences.

title: Exploration of visual perception plasticity in glaucoma patients
study purpose: 探索青光眼患者的双眼抑制地形图和视野缺损的关系，双眼对比度衰减和视力下降的关系，以及各项知觉缺损和视觉神经通路缺损的初步联系. 在此基础上进行探索性质的短期可塑检查进一步找出每个青光眼患者的脑视觉缺损位点及知觉训练阈值的敏感区，也就是该患者的学习区。 结合临床治疗手段，通过双眼视功能推拉模型的可塑训练抑制青光眼患者视野损害，减轻视野损害深度，提高其视觉质量的目标。
implementation site_1: 首都医科大学附属北京世纪坛医院
randomization_method: The third-party statisticians used SPSS statistical software to generate random schemes using the random number table method.

title: Virtual reality-assisted therapy for auditory verbal hallucinations: a multicenter randomized controlled clinical trial
funded (original): 山西省“136”重点学科建设经费
medical specialty (ICD-11): Symptoms, signs or clinical findings, not elsewhere classified
target Disease / conditions: Verbal auditory hallucination of mutiple disease
study purpose: 本项目拟开展以下关于虚拟现实辅助治疗多病种言语性幻听多中心临床疗效研究。（1）基于文献理论，研发阿凡达技术；（2）开展多中心临床试验，验证阿凡达技术较一般性心理干预在治疗言语性幻听方面具有较好临床疗效及成本效益，比较3类不同疾病患者阿凡达技术疗效；（3）探索阿凡达技术治疗言语性幻听临床疗效的调节机制，为实现阿凡达技术本土化及优化提供基础。
implementation site_1: 山西医科大学第一医院
implementation site_3: 太原市社会福利精神康宁医院
randomization_method: The Chinese clinical trial management public management platform ResMan (www.medresman.org) was used for randomized grouping and generating random number tables,which is saved by data administrator . According topermutation block randomization, the block size is determined according to the sample size of each group t
masking (original): 对临床数据的收集者实施盲法。

title: Theta-Burst Stimulation (TBS) Combined With Virtual-Reality Reconsolidation Intervention on Methamphetamine-Associated Memory: a Randomised Controlled Trial
funded (original): 北京市科学技术委员会，中国科学院心理研究所
study purpose: 本课题旨在研究基于记忆再巩固进行的theta短阵快速脉冲模式经颅磁刺激(TBS)结合虚拟现实技术（VR）干预对甲基苯丙胺成瘾治疗的效果。对比“VR提取-TBS伪刺激组”（对照组）在基线水平、治疗结束一周内、治疗结束至少三个月后的行为及神经生理指标，探讨“VR提取-TBS真刺激”是否有降低VR场景诱发的成瘾渴求的效果。同时探讨其他潜在变量（如用药史，睡眠，心境状态，焦虑情绪，正负性情绪等）对干预效果的影响。
implementation site_1: 山西省女子强制隔离戒毒所
randomization_method: participants will be randomly assigned by main investigator to three parallel groups using computer-generated random numbers with a 1:1:1 allocation ratio
masking (original): 本实验采用双盲设计。1）执行人员筛选和前测的测试者不知试验目的；2）采用电脑随机序列筛选首次进行真/伪刺激的被试，统一测试者在VR场景（MA/Neutral）中的指导语；2）进行经颅磁刺激操作的专业人员与参数设定人员分离，保证伪刺激时受试-执行人员双盲。

title: The clinical multicenter study: virtual reality assisted psychological intervention in the treatment of social cognitive impairment
funded (original): “136兴医工程”临床领军专科资助
study purpose: （1）确定虚拟现实（VR）技术作为辅助评估干预精神分裂症、抑郁症患者的社会认知功能工具的可行性，并制定针对社会认知障碍的相应的虚拟现实（VR）技术辅助临床干预方案； （2）开发一款适用于精神分裂症、抑郁症患者社会认知障碍的计算机虚拟现实（VR）辅助评估干预系统，能够更有效率的为患者提供临床评估干预方案； （3）采用该系统进行多中心的随机对照试验，通过社会认知功能恢复的临床指标及脑影像指标进行效果评价。验证效果后可应用于医院相关科室，帮助患者系统恢复社会认知功能。
implementation site_1: 山西医科大学第一医院
randomization_method: (1 ~ 100) were randomly grouped using ResMan (www.medresman.org), a public management platform for clinical trial management in China's clinical trial registry, and the assigned sequence was saved by the administrator. This study intends to collect 300 samples and randomize them according to the displacement block.
masking (original): 对临床数据的收集者实施盲法。对患者均采用平板电脑收集评估的相关信息。数据收集者不知道受试对象的分组情况。

title: Promotion and application research for home exercise combined with virtual reality rehabilitation technology to intervene reversible cognitive frailty
study purpose: 研究居家锻炼结合虚拟现实康复训练系统对可逆性认知衰弱患者的作用。
implementation site_1: 复旦大学附属华东医院
randomization_method: The investigators randomly assigned subjects to the experimental and control groups using a random number table method.

title: A clinical study for occupational performance and self-efficacy of stroke patients with hemiplegia based on virtual reality therapy
funded (original): 湖南省科技厅社会发展科技处；中南大学湘雅医院
study purpose: 以脑卒中偏瘫患者为研究对象，通过DIH系统中自带软件进行虚拟现实疗法和或传统作业疗法应用于偏瘫肢体，再依次评估与分析患者治疗前后的疗效。包括偏瘫上肢功能评定、平衡功能评定、日常生活活动能力评定、作业表现评估以及自我效能感评估等。本研究通过作业疗法联合情景模拟以改善上肢功能活动、 提高患者的日常生活活动能力及作业表现，提高自我效能感，为良好的回归社会生活做好充分准备。
randomization_method: random number table

title: Evaluating the effect of gait rehabilitation based on virtual reality technology in stroke patients: a prospective case-control study
funded (original): 福 建 省 科 学 技 术 厅资助项目
study purpose: 1.联合VR制作软件工程师，建立沉浸式VR技术的步态康复训练场景和方案； 2. 采用前瞻性随机对照设计，对卒中步态障碍患者随机分组进行康复训练，比较VR系统训练和传统康复训练，评价VR辅助康复的效果，从而探索VR在康复医学中的应用； 3.证实脑卒中后步态障碍患者通过沉浸式VR辅助康复训练方法的有效性； 4.通过临床实验收集可靠的临床研究数据，建立一个较为完善的VR辅助脑卒中步态康复的数据库；
implementation site_1: 福建医科大学附属协和医院
randomization_method: Random number table method. Subjects will be selected successively and ranked in order of inclusion. Subjects with an odd number of serial numbers will enter the experimental group, while subjects with an even number of serial numbers will enter the control group.
masking (original): 全部评定由专人盲法进行。

title: Virtual reality training for individuals with chronic neck pain: a randomized controlled trial
medical specialty (ICD-11): Diseases of the musculoskeletal system or connective tissue
study purpose: 基于《国际功能、残疾和健康分类》（International Classification of Functioning, Disability and Health,ICF)的理论框架，从由颈椎病引起颈痛的患者的颈部运动功能出发，运用近年来新兴的虚拟现实技术，通过单盲随机对照临床试验明确其治疗慢性颈痛患者的短期和长期的有效性。
randomization_method: The study leader will use random number table to generate random distribution sequence.
masking (original): 单盲 (结局指标评估者盲)

title: Therapeutic effect of virtual reality technology on neurological rehabilitation
study purpose: 本项目以镜像治疗为主要基本原理，融合康复医学知识与虚拟现实技术，设计实用性虚拟现实康复训练内容。探究传统康复治疗附加镜像原理的虚拟现实技术是否可促进康复疗程疗效，其通过哪些机制发挥作用、其可能适用的损伤类型与部位等，以为制定个体化康复方案，提高康复策略的有效性，使患者得到最佳治疗方案与更好的康复效果。为指导制定个体化训练策略方面，如逐渐增强剂量、实施可完全控制的练习提供依据与方向。
implementation site_1: 东南大学附属中大医院
randomization_method: Random number grouping by software generated by a third party

title: Multi-center random open-labeled parallel controlled trial for evaluating the effectiveness and safety of virtual-reality cognitive function rehabilitation software on cognitive functions for patients with mental disorder
funded (original): 杭州颐康医疗科技有限公司
study purpose: 与空白对照组相比，评价虚拟现实认知功能康复软件训练对精神障碍患者的认知功能改善的有效性与安全性。
implementation site_1: 浙江大学医学院附属第一医院
randomization_method: According to the trial plan, a total of 76 random numbers are generated by the block random method. The program is written on the SAS 9.4 software and the seed number is set to generate and export the random table that meets the requirements

title: The Application of Virtual Reality in Binocular Vision
funded (original): 郑州诚优成电子科技有限公司
study purpose: 本实验使用虚拟现实这一新型视频终端作为训练平台，研究其在双眼视训练中的应用。探究新型视频终端对提高双眼视功能的作用效果、治疗周期长短、安全性等，为我们综合评估并制定双眼视功能训练方案提供理论依据。
randomization_method: Researchers use the Research Manager to generate the random number sequence

title: Usability evaluation of early active limb mobilization based on virtual reality technology in patients with severe respiratory disease: A randomized controlled trial
study purpose: 评价基于虚拟现实的早期主动肢体运动模式对呼吸重症患者开展主动运动的依从性及康复效果的影响。
randomization_method: A non-research worker used SPSS to generate random number tables.

title: The pain management situation during hystersalpingography and it's intervention with virtual reality
study purpose: 旨在了解行子宫输卵管造影患者疼痛控制现状及影响因素，并评价虚拟现实技术用于子宫输卵管造影术疼痛的镇痛效果。为临床探索出一项操作性更强、对患者机体无创伤的、更具有经济可比性的镇痛方法。
randomization_method: The patients were given a number from 1 to 218.A computer generated 1:1 allocation sequence (in random permuted blocks of either four or six) will be created by an independent operator who is not directly involved with the study.

title: The use of virtual reality and exposure therapy for the treatment of methamphetamine use disorder
study purpose: 本研究拟通过设计标准的虚拟现实环境，利用线索暴露疗法，对冰毒成瘾人群进行干预，以进一步探索其线索反应特点，并初步干预降低其线索反应，进而通过随访研究了解研究对象出所后操守率等情况，为线索反应、防复吸、虚拟现实技术等学术领域提供新的依据。
implementation site_1: 湖南省麓山强制隔离戒毒所
implementation site_2: 长沙市公安局强制隔离戒毒所
randomization_method: The allocation will be accomplished using a randomisation table generated by a computeraized sequence generator at 1:1 ratio.

title: Effects of virtual reality combined with transcranial direct current stimulation on upper limb function in patients with ischemic stroke
study purpose: 探讨虚拟现实联合经颅直流电刺激对缺血性脑卒中患者上肢运动功能障碍的影响
implementation site_1: 上海市黄浦区东南医院
randomization_method: A doctor who is not involved in the experiment used a random number method in excel to generate a random digit sequence
masking (original): 单盲：对研究对象进行设盲

title: Effect of a memory reconsolidation Intervention with virtual reality on methamphetamine-associated memory: a randomised controlled trial
funded (original): 中国科学院心理研究所
study purpose: 检验基于虚拟现实技术的记忆再巩固行为干预方法对长期稳固的甲基苯丙胺成瘾记忆的干预效果，相较于单纯的消退训练和提取后再巩固时间窗外进行消退训练，是否有效的提取——消退训练能更好地降低甲基苯丙胺成瘾者的渴求和线索反应性。进一步在随访中，考察记忆再巩固行为干预方法的效果是否可推广至对新的甲基苯丙胺相关线索的反应上。
randomization_method: The allocation will be accomplished using a randomisation table generated by a computeraized sequence generator at 1:1 ratio.

title: Effects of combining short-term upper limb robot-assisted therapy with virtual reality for the rehabilitation of sub-acute stroke patients
study purpose: 本研究旨在探讨上肢机器人辅助治疗（RT）结合虚拟现实（VR）的短期治疗对亚急性脑卒中患者康复的影响。
randomization_method: Random Allocation Software (RAS)

title: A randomized controlled clinical trial for the efficacy of upper limb robot mediated virtual reality training for motor and cognitive dysfunction in acute (sub-acute) stroke
study purpose: 通过设计并实施一项上肢机器人虚拟现实训练治疗急（亚急）性期脑卒中患者运动及认知功能障碍的临床前瞻随机对照试验，为其适用性和有效性提供临床研究证据，为脑卒中的综合康复策略提供创新思路。
randomization_method: RAS 1.0 is used to generate a random number distribution table with 100 samples and 2 groupings, which is saved by an independent third party (individuals not participating in the experiment). A secret and hidden random distribution scheme is proposed before the end of the experiment. The random numbers

title: Therapeutic effect of virtual reality visual acuity training instrument on children with amblyopia
funded (original): 郑州诚优成电子科技有限公司
study purpose: 观察虚拟现实视力训练仪治疗儿童弱视的临床效果
randomization_method: Random number table method

title: An investigation of immersive virtual reality tour of operatiing theatre and operation process on relieving preoperative anxiety in children
target Disease / conditions: pediatric ENT surgery, pediatric urology surgery, pediatric
study purpose: 本研究拟评价虚拟现实技术让患者预先了解手术室环境及手术过程是否能减少患者术前焦虑，是否会减少术后瞻望及躁动的发生，是否能降低疼痛及住院时间。
implementation site_1: 中国医科大学附属盛京医院
randomization_method: computer generating radomization

title: Design and construct the VR-based individualized cognitive rehabilitation training system for schizophrenic patients
funded (original): 浙江省公益技术研究计划（LGF18H090003）
study purpose: （1）建立起适合中国人群的虚拟现实（VR）场景，建立正常对照认知功能常模数据库。（2）设计与构建个体化的基于VR的精神分裂症患者认知功能康复训练系统。（3）明确VR认知功能康复系统对精神分裂症患者认知功能的疗效, 制定相应的操作实施指南，进行临床推广和应用，提高患者认知功能，从而减少致残、促进患者更好地回归社会。
randomization_method: Computer-generated random number method

title: Virtual reality cue exposure for the mindfulness-based relapse prevention of drug abuse: a randomised controlled trial
funded (original): 中国科学院心理研究所
study purpose: 本课题的研究目标是探索结合虚拟现实暴露的正念防复发训练，与单独的正念防复发训练相比，对于降低物质滥用障碍者的渴求，焦虑，抑郁，以及改善情绪调节能力和提高正念能力的疗效。
implementation site_1: 北京天堂河强制戒毒所
randomization_method: The allocation will be accomplished using a randomisation table generated by a computeraized sequence generator at 1:1 ratio.

title: Preoperative visit combined with virtual reality technology to reduce preoperative anxiety of patients with elective surgery
study purpose: 我们设计这个随机平行对照试验是为了评估术前访视结合虚拟现实技术对择期手术患者焦虑的影响。
randomization_method: Random numbers generated by a computer

title: App-based Cognitive Behavioral Therapy Intervention for Fibromyalgia
funded (original): 首都卫生发展科研专项项目
medical specialty (ICD-11): Symptoms, signs or clinical findings, not elsewhere classified
study purpose: 本项目拟采用的基于应用程序的慢性疼痛认知行为疗法（ app based cognitive behavioral therapy for pain, app-based CBT-P） 是将慢性疼痛认知行为疗法的结构化干预内容嵌入应用程序，以图文、音频、视频等形式循序渐进向患者输出，患者自导式完成绝大部分干预内容，同时产品仍然设置了人工干预功能，即由擅长疼痛心理干预的心理治疗师为患者提供答疑、作业检查和反馈，该产品预计可节省80% 以上专业人力成本。该疗法有望弥补传统干预方式存在的问题，降低对 FM 患者开展心理治疗的门槛和成本，提升患者的治疗可获得性。
implementation site_1: 中国人民解放军总医院第一医学中心
implementation site_2: 中国人民解放军总医院第六医学中心
randomization_method: Participants were randomly allocated to either the intervention or control group. On-site research personnel opened the next sequentially numbered opaque envelope, which contained the treatment assignment. These envelopes were prepared by an individual not involved in the clinical aspects of the study. A random sequence was generated using SPSS V23.0 statistical software, stratified by medical center, with random block sizes of 2, 4, and 6, and allocated in a 1:1 ratio

title: Application of an mHealth apps in pelvic floor muscle exercise management program for rectal cancer patients patients with rectal cancer in China: a non-randomized type 1 hybrid effectiveness-implementation study
funded (original): 浙江省自然科学基金探索公益项目
study purpose: 本研究旨在推动“盆友”微信小程序在临床环境的应用，帮助医院推广盆底肌肉锻炼管理方案在低位前切除术后患者的实行、改善患者健康结局，拓展实施科学研究在结直肠癌移动健康应用程序的应用。研究中，“盆友”小程序定义为干预措施。鉴于其已通过可行性测试，但尚未证明其临床效果。因此，本研究属于I型效果-实施混合研究，拟在证明干预措施有效性的同时，探索“盆友”小程序在实施过程中的影响因素，并构建初步实施方案，记录相关实施过程指标。
randomization_method: none

title: A study using the digital health app "Shukang Diet" to intervene in hyperglycaemia and excessive weight gain during pregnancy
funded (original): 成都尚医信息科技有限公司
target Disease / conditions: Hyperglycemia and excessive weight gain during pregnancy
study purpose: 1.主要目的：确定采用“术康Diet”对妊娠期高血糖及孕期超重的孕妇产前血糖控制达标率和新生儿体重的影响。 2.次要目的：确定采用“术康Diet”对孕妇妊娠结局的影响。
implementation site_1: 四川大学华西第四医院/四川大学华西公共卫生学院
randomization_method: By specialized statisticians, simple randomization was used to randomly divide the subjects into intervention groups and control groups. The statistician was not involved in subsequent studies.

title: Safety plan mobile application versus pen-and-paper safety plan on self-injurious thoughts and behaviors prevention in Chinese adolescents with mood disorder: a randomized clinical trial
funded (original): 广州市卫生健康科研项目（2022A031003）
study purpose: 探究安全计划APP与纸笔型安全计划减少青少年自我伤害行为的有效性。评估用户对安全计划APP的可接受性，收集用户体验及改进建议，对应用程序进行深化改进，为临床指南和政府提供关于治疗干预自伤的信息或政策。探究血液及唾液中端粒长度对自伤自杀疗效的指示性，以及端粒长度与童年创伤的相关性。
randomization_method: Randomization is managed by the random scheme generated from SPSS. The serial number is sealed in a non-transparent envelope and transferred to the researcher from the principal investigator.
masking (original): 由于干预的形式不同，无法对患者和研究人员使用盲法。

title: The effectiveness of a new mobile app to improve symptoms in patients treated with radiotherapy for head and neck cancer: a single-center randomized controlled trial
funded (original): 中大青年护理人才培育基金（N2020Y06)和逸仙优秀青年护理人才培养基金（YHXL202103）
study purpose: 评估一项新型移动应用程序的可用性和有效性，以改善头颈癌放疗患者症状的自我管理和健康相关的生活质量。
implementation site_1: 中山大学孙逸仙纪念医院
randomization_method: Participants were assigned to an intervention group (with applets applied) or a control group (without applets applied) using block, hierarchical randomization procedures. Randomization was stratified according to tumor type. Due to the nature of the intervention, participants could not do it blind. The randomization is generated by a computer and carried out by a third party, and the assignment order is extracted from a database containing the numbers of all participants.

title: Feasibility, acceptability and effectiveness of app-assisted Home-based cardiac rehabilitation (iHeart) program for children and adolescents with congenital heart disease: a multicenter pragmatic randomized controlled trial
funded (original): 境外资金项目（美国中华医学会（CMB）公开竞争项目）
study purpose: 本项目旨在建立一个app辅助的居家心脏康复计划，并通过多中心实用性随机对照试验证实该计划的安全性、可行性和有效性。项目将评价iHeart计划对先心病儿童生存质量的改善作用，以及对患儿身心健康状况和依从性的影响。
randomization_method: After the enrollment procedure and baseline assessment were completed, participants were automatically assigned to the intervention or control group in a computer-generated random sequence in a 1:1 ratio, with no stratification or minimum quota. The randomized grouping scheme was generated by statistical professionals according to the segmentation method, and the investigator was responsible for including participants according to the scheme requirements, and when participants met the inclusion criteria, the project management staff arranged the corresponding intervention according to the randomized grouping.
masking (original): 在本研究中，对结果评估小组使用盲法。但由于只有一个组参与iHeart 计划，很难对参与干预的医务人员和患者及其家长采用盲法，因此对干预小组不使用盲法。

title: Effectiveness of App-delivered clinical decision making for the treatment of adults with non-specific low back pain
medical specialty (ICD-11): Symptoms, signs or clinical findings, not elsewhere classified
study purpose: （1） 探究应用程序的临床价值和可用性。 （2） 观察应用程序对于临床物理治疗师辅助评估及治疗非特异性下背痛患者的有效性。 （3） 通过干预，观察基于应用程序的临床决策进行物理治疗对非特异性下背痛患者的疼痛强度、功能障碍程度、步态的影响。
implementation site_1: 首都医科大学附属北京康复医院
randomization_method: The random sequence are created using a simple randomization method by a researcher who is not involved in the registration and evaluation of the subjects.The random number table method is used for grouping. Seventy-eight numbers are first drawn up, random numbers are generated using the random number table method, study subjects with odd random numbers are assigned to the intervention group and even numbers are assigned to the control group.A random assignment scheme table is developed.
masking (original): 该实验研究涉及下背痛物理评估和治疗的实施，为了执行该干预，因此患者、干预实施对该分组不施盲，只有评估者和数据管理及分析人员对此次患者分配情况不知情。患者对该研究的假设是不知情的，并将被鼓励不要透露他们的分配情况给评估者。

title: Application of perinatal education based on wechat application in labor analgesia
medical specialty (ICD-11): Factors influencing health status or contact with health services
study purpose: 探讨基于微信应用程序围产期宣教能否降低产妇围产期焦虑评分，提高产妇分娩镇痛体验满意度，为围产期分娩镇痛管理提供新思路。
randomization_method: A random number scheme generated by a computer by a researcher

title: COPD management by the team of general practitioners and specialists basd on the application
funded (original): 苏州协同医疗健康基金会
study purpose: 1.形成基层慢阻肺患者基于应用程序（APP）的数字化全科医生与专科医生联动共同管理的标准模式； 2.验证数字化全科医生与专科医生联动共同管理模式对基层慢阻肺患者的呼吸症状及生活质量的改善效果； 3.通过科研项目的实施及诊疗能力培训，提升全科医生规范化管理基层慢阻肺患者能力，同时提升社区慢阻肺疾病管理能力。
implementation site_1: 南大街街道社区卫生服务中心
implementation site_3: 铜元局街道社区卫生服务中心
implementation site_5: 双河口街道社区卫生服务中心
implementation site_6: 城厢街道社区卫生服务中心

implementation site_8: 小营街道社区卫生服务中心
implementation site_9: 望江街道社区卫生服务中心
implementation site_10: 笕桥街道社区卫生服务中心
randomization_method: The study design method of open label, parallel and multi-center cluster randomized controlled trial was adopted. Stratified cluster randomization was carried out in a 1:1 ratio according to geographical regions.

title: Application of family caregiver self-service application based on behavioral activation theory for dementia patients

study purpose: 通过在痴呆患者家庭照顾者中应用基于行为激活理论自助应用程序，观察其对家庭照顾者的负面情绪、照顾负担、罹患心血管疾病风险、睡眠质量的影响，为提高照顾者生活质量提供研究基础。

study purpose: 1.设计、开发一款适合急性冠状动脉综合征合并睡眠障碍患者的睡眠自我管理应用程序；2.探讨该睡眠自我管理应用程序的可行性和可用性。

title: Observation on the efficacy of application in the treatment of type 2 diabetes with insulin glargine
study purpose: （1）使用“与你同行”智能手机应用软件辅助非内分泌专科医生调整住院2型糖尿病患者甘精胰岛素剂量，观察其安全性、有效性、易用性。 （2）通过“与你同行”智能手机应用软件普及甘精胰岛素剂量调整知识。

randomization_method: The participants were randomized 1:1to one of two groups according to a random envelope: APP group,Conventional therapy group.
masking (original): 这是一个开放标签的研究。

title: Application of communication application in mechanically ventilated patients in ICU of cardiac surgery
funded (original): 上海市卫生健康委员会科研课题
medical specialty (ICD-11): Factors influencing health status or contact with health services
study purpose: 1. 探索沟通应用程序在ICU机械通气患者沟通中的应用效果。 2. 比较沟通应用程序与沟通板在ICU机械通气患者沟通中的效果。 3. 为沟通应用程序进一步更新和改进提供参考依据。

title: Application development and promotion of speech evaluation and rehabilitation training system after cochlear implantation
medical specialty (ICD-11): Diseases of the ear or mastoid process
study purpose: 探索提高汉语普通话CI植入者真实环境下言语感知能力的方法，以期为汉语普通话CI植入者提供新的言语康复策略。

randomization_method: N/A

title: Enhancing Intervention of Attenuated Psychosis Syndrome with M-Health
funded (original): 美国国立精神卫生研究所
study purpose: （1）建立于真实世界和患者反馈基础上开发基于手机应用程序的记忆注意强化训练（SMART）； （2）验证SMART软件在APS患者中的可行性和用户参与情况。探索该软件在保持社会认知功能乃至延缓或阻止SZ发病中的价值。 （3） 相关研究结果发表高质量国外学术论文1－2篇（SCI或EI收录，IF > 3分），发表国内核心期刊论文1－2篇。 （4）在个人和机构水平提高上海市精神卫生中心的移动医疗研究能力。
randomization_method: The project leader uses the random number table to randomly group the participants.

title: SCAMPI – Smoking Cessation App for (Chinese) Male Smokers: Randomised Controlled Trial
medical specialty (ICD-11): Factors influencing health status or contact with health services
study purpose: This project evaluates a mobile smoking cessation programme, called as SCAMPI, which consists of a social network subscription account (SCAMPI WeChat Official Account) and a social network based app (SCAMPI mini-programme). The SCAMPI programme was developed based on the preferred features (functions, user experience and user interface) of its target end--users (Chinese male smokers aged 25 to 44 years). This project will be implemented fully online. The evaluation will be run as a two-arm randomised controlled trial (RCT). After providing e-consents, participants will be randomly allocated to two groups. Participants allocated to intervention group will be offered the full version of SCAMPI programme (3 months intervention) while participants allocated to control group will be offered with restricted version of SCAMPI programme, which provides contact to general Chinese smoking cessation care (including Chinese Quitline and Local smoking cessation clinics). Smoking status of participants from both groups will be measured weekly over a 3-month period. Participants’ prolonged smoking abstinence over the evaluation period will be used to assess the effectiveness of the SCAMPI programme for helping people to quit smoking. At the end of the project, participants will be asked about their satisfaction levels with the SCAMPI programme. Participants from both groups will be offered the SCAMPI programme with free-of-charge for supporting them to quit smoking after the study complete.
randomization_method: The randomisation sequence will be generated by the trial statistician using block randomisation with variable block sizes of 2 or 4.

title: Development and Application of a WeChat Mini Program for Nutritional Management of Elderly Sarcopenia Patients Based on the ITHBC Model
medical specialty (ICD-11): Diseases of the musculoskeletal system or connective tissue
study purpose: 1.开发老年肌少症患者营养管理微信小程序，通过小程序进行营养管理。 2.记录老年肌少症患者营养相关数据，分析老年肌少症的相关指标，验证对指标是否有所改善。实时监测其营养状况，及时反馈和调整，形成闭环营养管理，并全面评估营养管理的效果。
implementation site_1: 东南大学附属中大医院
randomization_method: The study used a random number table method for grouping. Participants were numbered from 1 to 20 according to their enrollment sequence. Random numbers were generated using the Excel function RAND(), where participants corresponding to random numbers with odd last digits were assigned to the experimental group, and participants corresponding to random numbers with even last digits were assigned to the control group.
masking (original): 1.双盲方法和过程 1.1方法 1.1.1设计阶段： （1）组别随机分配： 参与者通过随机化过程被分配到干预组或对照组，随机化过程由研究外的第三方人员执行。 （2）盲法管理： 确保参与者和研究人员都不知道参与者的组别分配情况。 （3）培训研究人员： 对所有参与的研究人员进行培训，强调盲法的重要性和避免暴露组别的措施。 1.1.2数据收集和管理： （1）独立的数据管理团队： 数据的录入和分析由独立的团队完成，避免研究人员接触和影响数据。 （2）双重数据输入： 两名数据录入人员分别输入数据，确保数据录入的准确性。 1.2过程 （1）在研究启动会议上，强调双盲的重要性，并详细介绍相关的操作规范。 （2）随机分配和盲法管理：由第三方执行随机分配，并将组别信息封存，确保在研究过程中不会暴露组别信息。 （3）干预措施的实施：干预组和对照组的措施外观相同，由不知情的研究人员发放和监督实施。 （4）数据收集：参与者的所有数据收集均由不知情的研究人员进行，确保不会受到组别信息的影响。 （5）数据分析：数据分析前，组别信息仍保持盲法，确保分析结果的客观性。

title: Teach-Back mission mode combined intelligent reminder mini program in pregnant women OGTT trial
study purpose: 本研究通过对孕妇OGTT进行Teach-Back宣教模式联合智能提醒小程序干预，实现检查前、中、后的精准化、实时化的健康教育和跟踪管理，同时联合Teach-Back宣教模式，通过复述试验流程、注意事项的关键问题，强化了其对检查重要性和操作步骤的理解，确保孕妇充分知情并积极参与到自我健康管理中心。
randomization_method: Random number table

title: Design and application of intelligent interactive WeChat applet for breast cancer ambulatory chemotherapy
target Disease / conditions: Chemotherapy (abbreviated as chemotherapy), as one of the important therapeutic methods in the treatment of Breast Cancer(BC), can effectively inhibit the recurrence and metastasis of BC. Chemotherapy-induced myelosuppression (CIM) is one of the most common complications in cancer treatment, which is usually manifested as a decrease in white blood cells, red blood cells and platelets, with neutrop
study purpose: 本研究旨在通过调查BC日间化疗患者、乳腺外科医护人员对CIM管理需求的基础上，结合循证医学研发针对BC日间化疗患者骨髓抑制管理的一种智能交互式微信小程序，实现提醒复查血常规、检测上报与CIM预警报警一体化、智能化、规范化管理，创建一种科学、高效、可推广的CIM管理模式，提高疾病知识掌握度和化疗间歇期复查血常规的依从性，减少CIM的发生，减少患者感染和再入院率，从而减少患者家庭经济负担，提高医护人员工作效率和患者生活质量，为后续基于智能交互式微信小程序在BC日间化疗患者的应用研究提供参考依据。
implementation site_1: 遵义医科大学附属医院
randomization_method: A non-participant in the study used SPSS 29.0 software to generate random numbers using a random number generator to randomly divide the patients into a control group and an intervention group.

title: Effectiveness and safety of the digital therapy to improve the management of diabetes and its complication: A cluster of randomized, controlled, multicenter, open-label clinical trial
funded (original): 四川省卫生健康委员会
study purpose: 1. 主要目的： 第一阶段：验证与单纯常规医疗护理相比，在此基础上加上数字疗法是否会进一步降低血糖、血压、血脂水平，改善糖尿病并发症危险因素的控制。（随访1年） 第二阶段：验证与单纯常规医疗护理相比，在此基础上加上数字疗法是否会降低糖尿病并发症的发病率、延缓糖尿病并发症的疾病进展。（随访3年） 2. 次要目的：验证与单纯常规医疗护理相比，在此基础上加上数字疗法是否提高药物治疗、饮食生活习惯改善、运动增加等的依从性。
implementation site_3: 昆明医科大学第一附属医院
implementation site_5: 广东医科大学附属医院
implementation site_7: 新疆医科大学第一附属医院
implementation site_8: 西南医科大学附属医院
implementation site_9: 贵州医科大学附属医院
implementation site_10: 泸州市龙马潭区人民医院
randomization_method: The randomization will be matched according to the socioeconomic level of the region in which the centers are located and will be conducted independently in the Clinical Design and Statistics Office of West China Hospital of Sichuan University.
masking (original): 由于设计和干预的性质，收集临床结果数据的研究参与者、初级保健医生、研究护士都是不设盲的。然而，测量 HbA1c、LDL-c 和其他实验室结果的实验室技术人员以及终点裁决委员会成员却隐瞒了分配情况。

title: Efficacy and safety of digital therapy in the prevention and treatment of fracture risk in postmenopausal women with osteoporosis
medical specialty (ICD-11): Diseases of the musculoskeletal system or connective tissue
study purpose: 主要目的 评估绝经后女性骨质疏松症DTx结合地舒单抗治疗对比地舒单抗治疗防治骨折风险的有效性与安全性。 次要目的 （1）为绝经后女性骨质疏松症骨折风险防治提供最佳数字健康管理路径； （2）评估两组不同骨量研究参研者髋部、腰椎等部位的骨密度情况； （3）评估两组不同骨量研究参研者基于骨折风险评估工具（FRAX）的骨折风险； （4）评估两组不同骨量研究参研者肌力测试、起立行走测试评估量表（TUG）、生活质量量表（SF-12）评分。
implementation site_2: 遵义医科大学附属医院
implementation site_3: 海军军医大学第二附属医院
implementation site_7: 江西省赣州市人民医院
implementation site_9: 中国医科大学附属第一医院
randomization_method: The research center will assign a unique identification number (SID) (i.e., screening number) to each study participant, which will be randomly assigned using the central-layered block randomization method.

title: Digital-based Cognitive-Physical Exercise for Mild Cognitively Impaired Individuals Training at Home
funded (original): 中国国家自然科学基金（82360673），海南省重点研发项目（ZDYF2024SHFZ064）。
study purpose: 探究数字化居家认知和体能训练对轻度认知障碍患者的可行性及有效性。
implementation site_1: 嘉华社区卫生服务中心
implementation site_2: 金地社区卫生服务中心
implementation site_3: 滨濂社区卫生服务中心
randomization_method: Non-randomized, double-blind, controlled trial.

title: A comparative study of the effectiveness of digital therapy app telerehabilitation for postoperative rehabilitation of external ankle ligament injuries: a single-center, prospective, randomized controlled clinical trial
medical specialty (ICD-11): Injury, poisoning or certain other consequences of external causes
target Disease / conditions: Postoperative lateral collateral ligament injury of the ankle
study purpose: 观察数字疗法APP远程康复治疗与传统康复治疗对踝外侧副韧带损伤术后康复效果的影响
implementation site_1: 解放军总医院第四医学中心
randomization_method: Segmented randomization was used in this study. The randomly assigned codes were simulated on the computer by statistical professionals. Given the number of seeds, SAS statistical software was used to generate a table of random numbers.
masking (original): 本试验的干预措施为数字疗法需使用智能手机进行康复训练，无法实施盲法，为开放性临床试验，即研究者和研究对象均知晓分组和所接受干预情况。但是，本研究对结局评估人员实施盲法，即由不具体参与研究实施的独立结局评估人员在不了解研究对象分组的情况下进行结局指标评估

title: A comparative study of the effectiveness of digital therapy app tele-rehabilitation versus traditional rehabilitation for postoperative rehabilitation of anterior cruciate ligament injuries: a single-center, prospective, randomized, controlled clinical trial
medical specialty (ICD-11): Injury, poisoning or certain other consequences of external causes
study purpose: 观察数字疗法APP远程康复治疗与传统康复治疗对前交叉韧带损伤术后康复效果的影响
implementation site_1: 解放军总医院第四医学中心
randomization_method: A stratified block group randomization method was used, stratified by different surgical procedures. A statistician, who was not involved in the clinical trial, generated the random number and group information on a computer through SAS statistical software, which produced a randomized seed number as well as a randomized result to be kept as a blind base.
masking (original): 本研究对结局评估人员实施盲法，即由不具体参与研究实施的独立结局评估人员在不了解研究对象分组的情况下进行结局指标评估

title: A Single-Arm, Prospective Clinical Study Evaluating the Efficacy of Digital Therapeutics in Prehabilitation Exercise for Lung Cancer Patients Before Surgery
study purpose: 主要目的：评估肺癌术前预康复锻炼数字疗法对患者术前肺功能及术后结果改善的疗效情况； 次要目的：探索不同频次的预康复锻炼与术前肺功能改善的疗效相关性。
implementation site_2: 四川大学华西天府医院
randomization_method: None

title: Development and application of digital therapy slow disease management platform for neurogenic bladder patients based on neural network reinforcement learning
funded (original): 江苏省中医院南丁格尔专项课题
study purpose: 主要目的：通过前期循证构建临床神经源性膀胱管理方案，同时结合患者需求设计基于APP的神经源性膀胱数字疗法慢病管理平台，通过神经网络进行大数据建模，形成智能决策模型，实现疗程内病情智能分析以及、处方自调整等功能;强化学习则用于建立和患者交互互动的智能体。 次要目的：基于神经网络模型进行适应症的预测及管理。从而为神经源性膀胱患者提供个性化的、科学的膀胱管理建议，为后期实现NB监测、预防、管理到远程干预的一站式疾病管理模式奠定基础。
randomization_method: 1. The random number table method is adopted by the researcher to look up 60 2-digit random numbers from any specified row or column of numbers in the random number table downward and transcribe them in sequential numbering; 2. Sorting: Sort the random numbers from smallest to largest; 3. Grouping: 1-30 is the control group and 31-60 is the intervention group.

title: Digital therapeutics for the treatment of mild adolescent idiopathic scoliosis: a study protocol for a randomized controlled trial
funded (original): 上海交通大学医学院附属新华医院
medical specialty (ICD-11): Diseases of the musculoskeletal system or connective tissue
study purpose: 1.探究基于家庭康复的数字疗法对轻度AIS患者主弯Cobb角的影响； 2.探究数字疗法对轻度AIS患者肺功能的影响； 3.探究数字疗法对轻度AIS患者平衡功能的影响； 4.探究数字疗法对轻度AIS患者生活质量的影响； 5.建立轻度AIS患者的数字化管理模式，探寻该模式的优势与不足。
implementation site_1: 上海交通大学医学院附属新华医院
randomization_method: The test subjects will be allocated 1:1 into two groups as follows: treatment group; control group. The researcher will use a computer program (www.randomization.com) to generate random grouping information (random seed 16264) directly. The generated grouping information will be sealed, placed in an opaque envelope with a code written on the outside of the envelope, and sealed and handed over to the researcher. When the subjects enter the study, the subjects will be numbered and all baseline assessments will be completed before the corresponding numbered envelope is opened. Follow the envelopes for the intervention.
masking (original): 本试验采用单盲设计，参与评估的医师对受试者的分组不知情。

title: The therapeutic effect study of digital therapy on gestational weight gain among overweight and obese women
study purpose: 本研究旨在探讨妊娠期间利用数字疗法能否改善超重肥胖女性的生活方式达到适宜体重，从而改善孕产妇、新生儿围产结局。
randomization_method: Simple random: Researchers use the random number method to generate a random sequence of numbers

title: Effect of aerobic exercise-based digital therapy for children with neuroblastoma
study purpose: 主要研究目的：探究基于有氧运动干预的数字疗法对神经母细胞瘤患儿运动功能的影响。 次要研究目的：探究数字疗法对神经母细胞瘤患儿童体成分、肌肉力量和生活质量的影响，建立神经母细胞瘤儿童的数字化管理模式，完成软件的预试验，持续完善管理模式，为后期广泛推广提供高质量的循证依据。
implementation site_1: 上海交通大学医学院附属新华医院
randomization_method: None

title: A real-world research study of a digital therapy supported lifestyle intervention for the prevention of gestational diabetes in a high-risk women
study purpose: 1. 开展多中心真实世界临床研究，探索基于数字疗法的妊娠期生活方式干预能否降低妊娠期糖尿病高危人群发展为妊娠期糖尿病的风险以及体重管理和营养有关结局指标改善情况。 2. 评估基于数字疗法的GDM高危人群干预模式预防妊娠期糖尿病的实施情况，包括有效性、规范性、可接受性、采用性、恰当性、可行性、实施成本、覆盖度（普及率）和可持续性。
randomization_method: None

title: Adaptive improvement and clinical efficacy evaluation of digital therapeutics for cognitive rehabilitation of schizophrenia
funded (original): 北京市科学技术委员会AI+健康协同创新培育项目
study purpose: 通过严格设计的随机对照研究对比不同训练方案的效果，进而探索最佳训练方案。
randomization_method: random number sequence will be developed by the department of biostatistics, school of public health, peking university through computer.

title: To evaluate the efficacy and safety of digital therapy for tele-rehabilitation in patients with acute coronary syndrome after percutaneous coronary intervention: a single-center, prospective, open-label, randomized controlled clinical study
study purpose: 评估数字疗法对于冠心病人经皮冠脉介入手术之后远程康复过程中的有效性和安全性。
randomization_method: Simple Randomization: Testers, using python >= 3.9.7, numpy1.20.3 toolkit, set the random seed to "2022", and generate 1-100 random sequence.

study purpose: 联合开发一款具有创新性的数字化训练项目brainfit，主要用于提高ADHD患儿的注意力及治疗认知能力损伤。
implementation site_1: 郑州大学附属儿童医院（河南省儿童医院）
randomization_method: The randomization schedule was generated by an independent statistician not involved in the clinical trial with the use of the PROC PLAN procedure in SAS 9.4, and randomization was reproducible.

title: Prospective, Baseline Controlled Clinical Trial Protocol of Digital Therapy in Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD), Tic Disorder (TD), and Children with ADHD Comorbid with Tic Disorder (TD)
target Disease / conditions: Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD), Tic Disorder (TD), and Tic Disorder (TD) coexist with ADHD
study purpose: （1）评估数字疗法产品MindPro1联合药物疗法对6-12岁ADHD儿童的疗效和安全性评价； （2）评估数字疗法产品MindPro1对6-12岁抽动障碍（TD）以及抽动障碍（TD）共患注意缺陷多动障碍（ADHD）儿童的疗效和安全性评价
implementation site_1: 华中科技大学同济医学院附属武汉儿童医院

title: E-aid Cognitive Behavioral Therapy for Insomnia Disorder to Prevent Acute Insomnia from becoming Chornic : A Randomized Controlled Trial
study purpose: 1、主要研究目的： 验证失眠障碍数字疗法（e-aid Cognitive Behavioral Therapy for Insomnia, eCBTI） 预防急性失眠慢性化的疗效。 2、次要研究目的： （1）探究 eCBTI 改善失眠障碍患者主客观的睡眠状况； （2）验证 eCBTI 提升急性失眠障碍患者日间认知功能的表现； （3）验证 eCBTI 是否能增加患者肠道菌群的α和β多样性； （4）考察 eCBTI 减少患者促炎症细胞因子，改善免疫功能的效果。
implementation site_1: 南方医科大学南方医院
implementation site_5: 安徽医科大学附属巢湖医院
implementation site_6: 内蒙古自治区第三医院（内蒙古自治区精神卫生中心）
implementation site_8: 南华大学附属南华医院
implementation site_9: 重庆大学附属三峡医院（重庆三峡中心医院）
randomization_method: Using simple randomization, SPSS was used to develop double-table random blindness, and the designated researchers randomly assigned the participants to two groups according to the random number table.

title: Clinical study of digital therapy in the treatment of hypertension patents with anxiety and/or depression
funded (original): 中央高水平医院临床科研业务费资助，成果转化类项目
study purpose: 评估高血压常规西医治疗合并数字疗法对高血压伴焦虑和（或）抑郁患者的影响
randomization_method: The random number generator in spss26.0 was used to generate the corresponding random numbers of 264 patients. Using the random case sample function, 264 patients were randomly assigned to the control group and the treatment group in a ratio of 1:1.
masking (original): 本研究采用单盲方法，即盲终点法。只有结果评估者是盲目的。结果评估人员和数据分析师是第三方人员，他们不知道受试者的分组和干预措施的分配。

title: clinical effect of Non-drug intervention digital therapy on patients with mild cognitive impairment
funded (original): 上海博斯腾网络科技有限公司
study purpose: 本研究通过对进行“BBRT干预体系”（BBRT认知干预训练与BBRT认知干预数字疗法）的MCI患者前后对照研究，及与未进行干预的MCI患者对比，研究BBRT数字疗法的临床疗效，以及对各个认知域的作用特点。以此，探究BBRT干预体系在MCI患者中对认知功能改善作用，为进一步的人群应用提供临床证据支持，为MCI患者的认知干预方法的设计和优化提供数据支持。
randomization_method: According to the random distribution of unequal sample size between groups.The subjects were randomly divided into digital therapy test group, cognitive intervention training test group and control group according to the ratio of 100:19:100 through the random system

title: Effectiveness of Digital Therapeutics for the Perioperative Management in Patients Undergoing Lung Cancer Resection: An Open-Label, Non-Inferiority, Randomised Controlled Trial
study purpose: 评价围术期数字疗法管理方式是否有助于肺切除手术患者的术后肺功能恢复
implementation site_1: 浙江大学医学院附属第一医院
randomization_method: Using SAS 9.4(or later) statistical software, a block randomization method was used to generate serially numbered subject random coding tables in a 1:1 ratio between the digital therapy group and the multidisciplinary management group. Subjects were assigned a unique random number during the study.
masking (original): 因数字疗法和多学科管理的差异，无法对操作者和受试者设盲，故本研究采用开放设计。

title: Research and development of VR MBCT and its efficacy on anxiety and depressive disorders
funded (original): 杭州市生物医药和健康产业发展扶持科技专项（No.2022WJC064）
study purpose: 通过构建VR正念数字疗法系统，对轻中度焦虑或抑郁患者进行干预治疗，利用量表评估结合多维度的可穿戴传感器监测指标，通过对比传统MBCT疗法对轻中度焦虑或抑郁患者干预治疗的疗效，得出可量化的、有意义的差异性指标。最后，搭建并完善系统化的VR正念训练平台和VR诊断评估工具，开发一种针对抑郁和焦虑的智能化的动态优化正念治疗方案。
randomization_method: The researchers who did not participate in the intervention randomly generated numbers by computer, and then assigned them to the patients to be enrolled in the group. The odd numbers were enrolled in the VR MBCT group, and the even numbers were enrolled in the traditional MBCT group

title: Effectiveness of e-aid cognitive behavioral therapy for insomnia to reduce depression symptoms for insomnia patients: a multicenter randomized controlled trial
funded (original): 南方医科大学南方医院临床研究专项
study purpose: 1. 主要目的： 与eSHE相比，eCBTI是否更好地降低失眠障碍患者的12个月内抑郁症状发生率。 2. 次要目的： （1）与eSHE相比，eCBTI是否更好地降低失眠障碍慢性化； （2）探索应激功能紊乱所致的REMSI增加是否作为失眠障碍慢性化及其共病抑郁的潜在致病机制。
implementation site_1: 南方医科大学南方医院
randomization_method: The project leader used SPSS software to make the double table random blindness, the office nurses according to the random number table assigned the patient.

title: Application of digital therapy and Baduanjin in the improvement of hand fine motor in Parkinson's disease
